<head>atha puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। puruṣārthō'taśśabdāditi bādarāyaṇaḥ ।। 1 ।। śēṣatvātpuruṣārthavādō yathānyēṣviti jaiminiḥ
।। 2 ।। ācāradarśanāt ।। 3 ।। tacchrutēḥ ।। 4 samanvārambhaṇāt ।। 5 ।। tadvatō vidhānāt ।। 6 ।। niya-
māt ।। 7 ।। adhikōpadēśāttu bādarāyaṇasyaivaṁ taddarśanāt ।। 8 ।। tulyaṁ tu darśanam ।। 9 ।। asārvatrikī
।। 10 ।। vibhāgaḥ śatavat ।। 11 ।। adhyayanamātravataḥ ।। 12 ।। nāviśēṣāt ।। 13 ।। stutayē'numa-
tirvā ।। 14 ।। kāmakārēṇa caikē ।। 15 ।। upamardaṁ ca ।। 16 ।। ūrdhvarētassu ca śabdē hi ।। 17।।</sutra>
<lg><l>jñānaṁ na mōkṣahētuḥ karmasu tatkartr̥saṁsmr̥titvēna । śēṣatvātkartaiva hi tattvamasītyucyatē brahma ।। 293 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>adhikōpadēśatastu jñānaṁ tadviṣayamatra vidhiviṣayaḥ । tasya phalākāṅkṣāyāṁ mōkṣaḥ syādrātrisatranayāt ।। 294 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti nayamaṇimālāyāṁ puruṣārthādhikaraṇam ।। 1 ।।</head>
<pb n="390"/>
<p>ēvātra caturthāśramadharmasadbhāvē sandēhē sati pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ---<quote>‘trayō dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> ityādau
caturthāśramācōdanāt <quote>‘ētamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> ityādi catu-
rthāśramavacanamupāsanastutyarthavādamēva jaiminirmanyatē । apavadati hi <quote>‘vīrahā vā
ēṣa dēvānāṁ yō'gnimudvāsayatē’</quote> iti śrutiḥ caturyāśramam । atō'gnihōtraparityāgē
mahān dōṣa iti nāsti tatparityāgēnāśramāntaramiti ।। atha siddhāntaḥ---
<sutra>sū ।। anuṣṭhēyaṁ vādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśrutēḥ ।। 19 ।।</sutra>
gr̥hasthāśramādivadāśramāntaramapyanuṣṭhēyamiti bhagavatō bādarāyaṇasya matam ।
tatra <quote>‘trayō dharmaskandhāḥ’</quote> <quote>‘ētamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> iti sarvā-
śramasāmyaśrutēḥ । agnyudvāsanadōṣō gr̥hasthaviṣaya ēva । ataścaturthāśramadharmasadbhāvaḥ ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pa1tnīsannihitē vānaprasthē agnihōtrādīnāṁ sattvānnaiṣṭhikē patnīsāpēkṣakarmaṇāmabhāvē'pi japa-
tapōdānaprabhr̥tīnāṁ svātantryēṇa puṇyalōkasādhanānāṁ sattvāt । ata itthaṁ pūrvōktaṁ bādhaka-
mupapādanīyam । sannyāsini na vidyāyāḥ karmāṅgatvaṁ saṁbhavati । mumukṣvēkādhikārē sannyāsē
abhyudayaphalānāṁ karmaṇāmaprasaktēḥ । nityānāmapi patnīsādhyānāmagnihōtrādīnāmabhāvāt ।
snānaśaucādyācārāṇā<quote>‘mānarthakyamiti cēnna tadapēkṣatvā’</quote>diti <ref>(bra॰ 3—1—10)</ref> sūtrō-
ktanyāyēna vaidikakarmādhikāramātrāpādakānāṁ svatantraphalarahitānāṁ karmavatsvāśramāntarēṣu
karmādhikārārthatvasyēva mōkṣārthavidyāvati sannyāsini vidyādhikārārthatvasyaiva prāptēriti ।
naitadupapadyatē । sannyāsasyaiva śaśaśr̥ṅgāyamāṇatvāt । <quote>‘trayō dharmaskandhā yajñō'dhyayanaṁ
dānamiti । prathamastapa ēva, dvitīyō brahmacāryācāryakulavāsī, tr̥tīyō'tyantamātmānamā-
cāryakulē'vasādayan sarva ētē puṇyalōkā bhavanti brahmasaṁsthō'mr̥tatvamētī’</quote>ti śrutau gr̥-
hasthavānaprasthanaiṣṭhikānāṁ trayāṇāmēvāśramāṇāṁ vidhānēna sannyāsasyācōditatvāt । na ca
<quote>‘brahmasaṁsthō'mr̥tatvamētī’</quote>tyēṣā sannyāsacōdanēti śaṅkanīyam । <quote>‘trayō dharmaskandhā’</quote>ityupakrā-
ntasaṁkhyāvirōdhāpattēḥ । <quote>‘brahmasaṁsthō'mr̥tatvamētī’</quote>tyasya triṣvēvāśramēṣu karmāṅgabhūtavidyā-
praśaṁsārthatvōpapattēḥ । na <quote>‘caitamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravrajantī’</quote>ti śrutyantaraṁ sannyā-
savidhāyakaṁ syāditi vācyam । agnyudvāsananindāvirōdhēna tasyāpi vidyāpraśaṁsāmātrapa-
ratvāditi <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। anuṣṭhēyaṁ bādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśrutēḥ ।। 19 ।।</pratika> āśramāntaraṁ gārha-
sthyātiriktamāśramatrayam । yadyapi pūrvapakṣiṇassannyāsamātrē vipratipattiḥ । tathāpi yathā
<quote>‘trayō dharmaskandhā’</quote> ityatra vidhivibhaktirāhityē'pi brahmacaryavānaprasthāśramayōrgr̥hasthāśrama-
vadavigītamanuṣṭhēyatvaṁ ēvaṁ sannyāsasyāpi yuktam । <quote>‘ētamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravra-
jantī’</quote>tyatrāpi vidhivibhaktirāhityasyānuṣṭhēyatvāvighātakatvāditi dr̥ṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikatātpa-
ryēṇa trayamapyupāttam ।। nanvagnyudvāsanē dōṣaśravaṇaṁ sannyāsasyānuṣṭhēyatvakalpanāvirōdhītyā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>agnyudvāsanadōṣa iti</pratika> । gr̥hasthasyāpi hi nimi2ttē sati vidhita utsargēṣṭipū-
rvakē tyāgē na dōṣaḥ । tasmādavaidhatyāgaviṣayā dōṣaśrutiriti pravivrajiṣōḥ/?/ tyāgavidhisadbhā-
vāt । tasyāpi vidhitastyāgō na dōṣāvaha iti bhāvaḥ । na cāśramatritvasaṅkhyāvirōdhaḥ mō-
<note>(1) <quote>‘patnīsāhityavānaprasthē’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘vairāgyē sati’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>

<sutra>sū ।। vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘upari hi dēvēbhyō dhārayati’</quote> ityatrāprāptatvēna yathā vidhiḥ । tadvadatrāpi vidhirēva ।
athavā । jābālaśrutau pratyakṣavidhirapyasti ‘brahmacaryaṁ samāpya gr̥hī bhavēt gr̥hī vā
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kṣāśramasya caturthasya sadbhāvē'pyabhyudayasādhanadharmapradhānānāmāśramāṇāṁ tritvōpapattēḥ । ata
ēva <quote>‘sarva ētē puṇyalōkā bhavantī’</quote>ti tēṣāṁ dharmaphalabhūtā puṇyalōkāvāptirucyatē । na hi
sannyāsasya puṇyalōkāvāptiḥ phalam । <quote>‘ētamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravrajantī’</quote>tyava-
dhāraṇēna parabrahmātiriktalōkēṣaṇāvyavacchēdāt । tadanantaraṁ <quote>‘tē ha sma putrēṣaṇāyāśca vittēṣa-
ṇāyāśca lōkēṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāya atha bhikṣācaryaṁ carantī’</quote>ti sphuṭamēva lōkēṣaṇāvyāvarta-
nāt । <quote>‘sannyāsādbrahmaṇaḥ sthānaṁ brāhmaṁ sannyāsināṁ smr̥ta’</quote>mityādivacanāni tvihāparipūrṇa-
vidyānāṁ sannyāsināṁ <quote>‘prāpya puṇyakr̥tāṁ lōkā’</quote>niti smr̥tivadāntarālikaphalābhiprāyāṇi ।
anyathā śrutivirōdhāpattēḥ । <quote>‘brahmasaṁsthōmr̥tattvamētī’</quote>tyētattu brahmasaṁsthaśabdasya āgnēyīnyā-
yēna yaugikatayā prakr̥taparatvēna trayāṇāmētēṣāmāśramiṇāṁ madhyē bhāgyavaśādyasya brahmasaṁsthā
jātā tasya muktirityētatparam । yathā <quote>‘rājagr̥hē brāhmaṇā daśadaśa svarṇān labhanta’</quote> iti
vacanānantaraṁ <quote>‘brahmaniṣṭhaḥ śataṁ suvarṇā’</quote>niti vacanaṁ tēṣāṁ vrāhmaṇānāṁ madhya ēva yō brahmani-
ṣṭhastasyādhikaphalaprāptipratipādanaparam । parivrājakasya tu mukti<quote>‘rētamēva pravrājina’</quote> iti ।
vacanāntarēṇaiva pratipādyata iti ।। nanu trayō dharmaskandhā itya<quote>‘traitamēva pravrājina’</quote> ityatra
ca vidhivibhaktyabhāvē kathamāśramāṇāmanuṣṭhēyatvasiddhirityāśaṅkya sārvatrikīṁ gatimāha---
<pratika>sū॰ ।। vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘adhastātsamidhaṁ dhārayannanudravēdupari hi dēvēbhyō
dhārayatī’</quote>ti mr̥tāgnihōtraprakaraṇagataśrutau liṅ‌vibhaktiyōgādadhōdhāraṇa ivāprāptatvādupari-
dhāraṇē'pi vidhirāśrīyatē । <quote>‘vidhistu dhāraṇē'pūrvatvā’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇē । sa iha dr̥ṣṭā-
ntīkr̥taḥ । avadhāraṇārthō vākāraḥ । ēvaṁ jābālōpaniṣadi śrutānāśramavidhīnkarēṇa vidhāya
pratyakṣavidhyabhāvē'pi gārhasthyādivatsannyāsasyāpi vidhikalpanēnānuṣṭhēyatvasiddhirapratyūhēti
samarthitam । idānīṁ vidhiṁ siddhaṁ kr̥tvā cintāmuddhāṭayati---<pratika>athavēti</pratika> । asminpakṣē <quote>‘trayō
dharmaskandhā’</quote> ityādau gārhasthyādiṣu vidhirna kalpanīyaḥ । anyataḥ prāptisaṁbhavāt । atrāpi
tēṣu vidhikalpanē vidhyanēkatvēna vākyabhēdāpattēścētyanuvādatvasūcanārthassautrō hi vākāraḥ ।
yadvā---gārhasthyādīnāṁ kṣudraṁ phalamiti tata utkr̥ṣṭaphalatvēna stutyā sannyāsamātrē vidhiḥ
kalpanīyaḥ । brahmasaṁsthaśabdasya yaugikatvē'pi saṁpūrvasya tiṣṭhatēḥ samāptivācakatayā karma-
vyavacchēdēna brahmaikaniṣṭhatvārthakasya sannyāsinyēva vyavasthitatvāt । tathā satyēva gārhasthyā-
dyasādhāraṇadharmōpanyāsapūrvakatattadāśramasaṁkīrtanaprāyapāṭhānugrahalābhācca । na caivaṁ sati
sannyāsināmēva muktiḥ syānna gr̥hasthādīnāmiti vācyam । itaranindāyāḥ stōtavyastutyartha-
tayā svārthē tātparyābhāvēna <quote>‘sa khalvēvaṁ vartayanyāvadāyuṣaṁ brahmalōkamabhisampadyatē yē cēmē'-
raṇyē śraddhā tapa ityupāsatē tē'rciṣamabhisaṁbhavanti’</quote> ityādiśrutiprāptasyārthasya tadapratikṣē-
<pb n="392"/>
vanī bhūtvā pravrajēt’ iti । nātra kramē niyamaḥ । <quote>‘utsannāgniranagnikō vā yadaharēva
virajēt tadaharēva pravrajēt’</quote> iti śrutēḥ । janmāntarasukr̥taparipākēna viśuddhāntaḥkara-
ṇasya brahmacaryādēva pārivrājyaṁ bhavati ।। <quote>‘‘r̥ṇāni trīṇyapākr̥tya manō mōkṣē nivē-
śayēt । anapākr̥tya mōkṣaṁ tu bhajamānō vrajatyadhaḥ ।।’’</quote> ityādiniṣēdhastvavirakta-
viṣayaḥ । <quote>‘vīrahā vā ēṣa dēvānāṁ yō'gnimudvāsayatē’</quote> ityagnyudvāsananiṣēdhāt brahma-
caryādēva pārivrājyaṁ na gārhasthyātparamiti kēcit । tathā sati <quote>‘vanī bhūtvā
pravrajēt...utsannāgniranagnikō vā yadaharēva virajēt tadaharēva pravrajēt’</quote> ityādi-
vidhivaiyarthyaṁ syāt । atō brahmacaryādēva pravrajēditi vā, vanī bhūtvā pravrajēditi
vā na nirbandhaḥ kāryaḥ । brahmacaryādēva pravrajēditi vadatāmayamabhiprāyaḥ---sāgnirana-
gnikaścēti dvāvēvāśramau । tatra brahmacārī parivrāṭ ca anagniḥ, gr̥hasthō vānaprasthaśca
sāgniḥ । agnimādhāyōdvāsya pārivrājyāt brahmacaryāt pārivrājyamēvātīva mukhya-
miti । anyathā śrutivirōdhāpattēḥ । ataḥ sarvāśramadharmasiddhiḥ ।।
iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
pyatvāt । <pratika>nātrēti</pratika> । atra sannyāsē uktakramō niyatō na bhavatītyarthaḥ । itarēṣu triṣvapyu-
ktakramō niyata ēva । <pratika>aviraktaviṣaya iti</pratika> । anatyantaviraktō yaḥ kramasaṁpādanīyavairā-
gyastadviṣaya ityarthaḥ । <pratika>tathā satīti</pratika> । tathā cōdāhr̥tavākyajātē dr̥ḍhavairāgyasyaivādhikā-
riviśēṣaṇatvaśravaṇāt । sati tasmin yadākadācit sannyastavyamityarthaḥ । <quote>‘atha yadi
vratī vāvratī vā snātakō vāsnātakō vā utsannāgniranagnikō vē’</quote>ti viśiṣya kēṣāñcitkī-
rtanasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ । upakrāntamāsōpavāsādivratēnāntarā vairāgyē sati vratasamāptiparyantaṁ
na vilambanīyam । anupakrāntavratēnēva tadānīmēva sannyastavyam । tathādhyayanārthamupakrānta-
gurukulavāsēna samāvartanaparyantaṁ na vilambanīyam । samāvr̥ttēnēva tadānīmēva sannyastavyam ।
vicchinnāgninā <quote>‘tathaikē prājāpatyāmēvēṣṭiṁ kurvanti tadu tathā na kuryāt । āgnēyīmēva ku-
ryā’</quote>dityādinā vakṣyamāṇēṣṭipūrvakāgnisamārōpaṇāya agnyādhānaparyantaṁ na vilambanīyam ।
anagnikēnēva akr̥tāgnisamārōpaṇēnaiva sannyastavyamiti ।। nanu kathaṁ pratyakṣaśrutau vidyamā-
nāyāmēva tāmavigaṇayya kēcidbrahmacaryādēva pārivrājyaṁ vadantītyāśaṅkya mukhyatvābhiprāyēṇē-
tyāha---<pratika>brahmacaryādēvēti</pratika> । mukhyatvamapi sarvatra samānam । adhikāriviśēṣaṇasya vairāgya-
syaikarūpatvāditi kēcidityanēnaiva dhvanitam ।।</p>
<head>iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। parāmarśaṁ jaiminiracōdanāccāpavadati hi ।। 18 ।। anuṣṭhēyaṁ bādarāyaṇaḥ sāmyaśrutēḥ ।। 19 ।।
vidhirvā dhāraṇavat ।। 20 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>saṁnyāsē nāsti vidhirna kalpanaṁ vīrahēti dōṣagatēḥ । tasmādvidyāstutayē śrutiṣu parāmarśamēvāsya ।। 295 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>dhāraṇa iva vidhikalpanasucitaṁ tasminnapūrvatvāt । dōṣasya śravaṇaṁ tu tadutsannāgnikagr̥hasthaparam ।। 296 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti parāmarśādhikaraṇam ।। 2 ।।</head>
<pb n="393"/>
atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cēnnāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ōmityētadakṣaramudgīthamupāsīta’</quote> ityupakramya <quote>‘sa ēṣa rasānāṁ rasatamaḥ paramaḥ
parārdhyō'ṣṭamō ya udgīthaḥ’</quote> ityēvaṁjātīyakōdāharaṇē udgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādidr̥ṣṭi-
rvidhīyatē na vēti saṁśayaḥ ।। kiṁ tāvat prāptam ? nōdgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādidr̥ṣṭi-
rvidhīyatē, kiṁtu, <quote>‘iyamēva juhūḥ svargō lōka āhavanīyaḥ’</quote> itivat karmāṅgabhūtō-
dgīthādyupādāya tasya rasatamatvādivacanaṁ stutimātramiti cēditi pūrvapakṣasamāptiḥ ।।
siddhānta ucyatē---nāpūrvatvāditi । na stutimātraṁ kiṁtūdgīthādiṣu rasatamatvādi-
dr̥ṣṭirvidhīyata ēva, apūrvatvāt । na caivaṁ juhūrityādinyāyāvatāraḥ, juhvādivi-
dhivadudgīthādividhēratrāsannidhānāt । atō rasatamatvādidr̥ṣṭividhirēva ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘udgīthamupāsīta’</quote> iti vidhipratyayaścātra śrūyatē । atō'pi rasatamatvādidr̥ṣṭi-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cēnnāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।।</pratika> stutividhiprasaṅgādidama-
dhikaraṇam । <pratika>ityupakramyēti</pratika> । śrūyata iti śēṣaḥ । <pratika>sa ēṣa iti</pratika> । <quote>‘ēṣāṁ bhūtānāṁ pr̥thivī
rasaḥ pr̥thivyā āpō rasō apāmōṣadhayō rasaḥ ōṣadhīnāṁ puruṣō rasaḥ puruṣasya vāgrasaḥ
vāca r̥grasaḥ r̥cassāma rasaḥ sāmna udgīthō rasa’</quote> ityanukrāntānāṁ pr̥thivyādīnāṁ rasānāṁ
rasatamaḥ atiśayitō rasaḥ paramaḥ utkr̥ṣṭaḥ । utkr̥ṣṭatvē hētuḥ parārdhyaḥ parasya brahmaṇō'rdhaṁ
sthānamarhati paramātmōpāsanāsthānabhūta ityarthaḥ । aṣṭamaḥ pr̥thivyādirasāpēkṣayā । kō'sā-
vēvaṁbhūtaḥ yadudgīthaḥ udgīthāvayavapraṇava ēvaṁbhūta ityarthaḥ । <quote>‘ēvaṁjātīyaka’</quote>mityanēna <quote>‘iyamēva-
rgagnissāmē’</quote>tyādikaṁ gr̥hyatē <quote>‘iyamēva juhū’</quote>rityādinirdēśasāmyādudgīthādividhisamabhivyāhā-
rābhāvācca saṁśayaṁ darśayati---<pratika>kimiti</pratika> । yadyapi karmāṅgaviṣayaguṇapratipādanamātrē stutyartha-
tvaniyamō nāsti । varṇamayyādivākyēṣu vyabhicārāt । utkr̥ṣṭatvēna guṇaviśēṣaṇē'pi guṇa-
niyamaḥ । <quote>‘hiraṇmayyaḥ srucō bhavantī’</quote>tyādiṣu vyabhicārāt । tathāpyananuṣṭhēyatvēnāpi guṇa-
viśēṣaṇē'sti niyamaḥ । rasatamādivākyānāmudgīthādisamabhivyāhārābhāvē'pyavyabhicarita-
vidhisambandhinōdgīthādinōpasthāpitēṣu tattadvidhiṣu stāvakatvēnānvayassaṁbhavati । na ca
stāvakavākyānāṁ stutyavidhisamabhivyāhāraniyamō'sti । <quote>‘ētadbrāhmaṇānyēva pañca havīṁṣi
yadbrāhmaṇānītarāṇī’</quote>tyatidiṣṭēṣu pañcasañcarārthavādēṣu vyabhicārāt tasmādudgīthādiṣu na rasa-
tamatvādidr̥ṣṭividhiriti pūrvapakṣamāha---nōdgīthādiṣviti । <pratika>asannidhānāditi</pratika> । prakaraṇē
saṁbhavadanvayasyōtkarṣō na yuktaḥ । pañcasañcarārthavādānāṁ tu vacanabalādanyatrāpyanvaya iti
bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</pratika> na kēvalaṁ stutyarthatvapratikṣēpakamudgīthādividhya-
saṁnidhānamātraṁ । kintu dr̥1ṣṭyarthatvōpapādakamupāsanāvidhisannidhānaṁ cāstītyanēna sūtrēṇōcyatē ।
<note>1 <quote>‘dr̥ṣṭividhitvōpapādaka’</quote>mati ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="394"/>
vidhiriti ।।
iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।
atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। pāriplavārthā iti cēnna viśēṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।।</sutra>
vēdāntēṣu vidyārambhē---<quote>‘pratardanō ha vai daivōdāsiḥ’</quote> ityādyākhyāyikā ā-
mnātāḥ । tāḥ pāriplavārthā uta vidyāstutyarthā iti saṁśayaḥ ।। kiṁ tāvatprāptam ?
pāriplavārthā iti । aśvamēdhayāgē rājānaṁ sakuṭumbamupavēśya tatpuratō vaidikānyā-
khyānānyadhvaryuṇā vaktavyāni । tadidaṁ pāriplavākhyaṁ karma <quote>‘pāriplavamācakṣīta’</quote> iti
vākyēna vihitam । tatra <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplavē śaṁsanti’</quote> iti viniyō-
gādupaniṣadārambhagatā apyākhyāyikāstadarthā iti cēditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। tatrō-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
na cōpāsanavidhinānvayē'pi stutyarthatā kiṁ na syāditi śaṅkanīyam । vidhiviṣayasamarpa-
katayā pravr̥ttiviśēṣakaratvē saṁbhavati vyarthaprāyastutyarthatvakalpanāyōgāditi bhāvaḥ । vidhi-
pratyayayuktakriyāśabdō'tra bhāvaśabdō vivakṣitaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<head>atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। pāriplavārthā iti cēnna viśēṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।।</pratika> rasatamatvādīnāmupāsyaviṣa-
yasamarpakatvavadākhyānānāṁ pāriplavaprayōgavidhiśēṣatvaṁ stutyarthatvāpēkṣayā jyāyaḥ । pravr̥ttiviśē-
ṣakaratvāditi pūrvapakṣōtthānātsaṅgatiḥ । <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyaviśēṣaśravaṇādvākyaśēṣē vi-
śēṣasaṁkīrtanācca saṁśayaḥ । upakramaśrutasya <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyasya vākyaśēṣagatēnākhyā-
naviśēṣasaṁkīrtanēna saṅkōcō na yuktaḥ । upakramasyōpasaṁhārataḥ sarvākhyānaśrutērākhyānaviśē-
ṣasannidhānataśca prabalatvāt । anyathā <quote>‘ēṣa vāva prathamō yajñō yajñānāṁ yajjyōtiṣṭōmō
ya ētēnēmāniṣṭvāthānyēna yajatē’</quote> ityatrānyaśabdasya jyōtiṣṭōmētarasarvakratuparāmarśinō
<quote>‘yō hi trivr̥danyaṁ yajñakratumāpadyatē sa taṁ dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśassa taṁ yassaptadaśassa
taṁ ya ēkaviṁśassa ta’</quote>miti vākyaśēṣagatatr̥vr̥dādistōmakakratusaṁkīrtanānusārēṇa tāvanmātrē
saṅkucitavr̥ttitvāpattēriti pūrvapakṣayati---<pratika>tatrēti । tadarthā iti</pratika> । nyāyataulyāt karma-
kāṇḍagatākhyānēṣvapi samānō'yamākṣēpaḥ । na ca yathā japapārāyaṇādiviniyuktānāṁ
vidhivākyānāṁ vidhāyakatvamapi । ēvaṁ pāriplavē viniyuktānāmākhyānānāṁ stutyartha-
tvamapyastviti vācyam । vyarthaprāyaṁ hi stutyarthatvaṁ sarvathā prayōjanāntarābhāvē kalpanī-
yam । pāriplavārthatvēna sārthakatvasaṁbhavē na ca vyarthaṁ tallakṣaṇāklēśāśrayaṇēna kalpanī-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। stutimātramupādānāditi cēnnāpūrvatvāt ।। 21 ।। bhāvaśabdācca ।। 22 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>dr̥ṣṭirnōdgīthādiṣu rasatamatādērvidhīyatē śrutyā । karmāṅgagōcaratayā yūpādityādivatstutiparatvāt ।। 297 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>karmāṅgaprakaraṇavaidhuryānnātra tatstavanam । syādvidhirupāsanāvidhisannihitatvādapūrvatvāt ।। 298 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti stutimātrādhikaraṇam ।। 3 ।।</head>
<pb n="395"/>
<p>ttaram---na viśēṣitatvāditi । na pāriplavārthāstāḥ । <quote>‘prathamē'hani manurvaivasvatō
rājā...dvitīyē'hani yamō vaivasvatō rājā’</quote> ityādinā pāriplavārthānāmākhyāyi-
kānāṁ viśēṣitatvāt ।। aupaniṣadākhyāyikāḥ saṁnihitavidyāvidhibhirēkavā-
kyatvāt vidyārthā ityāha---
<sutra>sū ।। tathācaikavākyatōpabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
yathā <quote>‘sō'rōdīt’</quote> ityādyākhyānānāṁ karmavidhibhirēkavākyatā, tathā vidyā-
vidhibhirēkavākyatōpasaṁbandhācca vidyāstutyarthā ēvēti ।।
iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
yamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>viśēṣitatvāditi</pratika> । yukta <quote>‘mēṣa vāva prathama’</quote> ityādivākyagatānyaśa-
bdasya jyōtiṣṭōmētarasarvakratuparatvaṁ । tasya svatassaṁkōcākāṅkṣāvirahāt । tadabhiprāyēṇaiva pū-
rvatantrē <quote>‘ēkastōmē vā kratusaṁyōgāt’</quote> <quote>‘sarvēṣāṁ vā cōdanāviśēṣātpraśaṁsāstōmānā’</quote>miti pūrvō-
ttarapakṣasūtrābhyāṁ vākyaśēṣānusārēṇa saṅkōcō nirastaḥ । iha tvasti <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>-
tyasya <quote>‘athaitasyaiva hī’</quote>ti yōjanasya <quote>‘sarva ēva lipsanta’</quote> ityatra sarvaśabdasyēva saṅkōcākāṅkṣā ।
anantaśākhāgatasarvākhyānaśaṁsanasyāśakyatvāt । satyāṁ ca tadākāṅkṣāyāṁ vākyaśēṣaśrutē-
ṣvēvākhyānaviśēṣēṣu saṅkōcō yukta iti bhāvaḥ ।। ēvaṁ <quote>‘sarvāṇyākhyānānī’</quote>tyasya saṅkōcē
satyaupaniṣadānāmākhyānānāṁ vidyāvidhisamabhivyāhārāt stutyarthatayā tadanvaya ēva syā-
dityuttarasūtrābhiprāyaṁ darśayannavatārayati---<pratika>aupaniṣadēti ।। sū॰ ।। tathā caikavākyatō-
pabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</pratika> ēkavākyatayānvayaḥ ēkavākyatōpabandhaḥ । <pratika>yathā sō'rōdīditi</pratika> ।
tatrāpi samānō'yaṁ siddhāntanyāya iti bhāvaḥ । na cākhyāyikānāṁ stutimātraprayōjana-
tvēna vyarthaprāyatā । vidyāpratipattisaukaryasyāpi tatprayōjanatvāt । ākhyāyikāśravaṇē hya-
vahitā avyavadhānaṁ labhantē । yathā---upāyēna tu yacchakyaṁ na tacchakyaṁ parākramai’riti
nītiśāstrārthōpadēśē <quote>‘kākaḥ kanakasūtrēṇa kr̥ṣṇasarpamamāraya’</quote>dityākhyāyikayā ārthavādi-
kaliṅgadarśanaiśca bahavō vidhyarthāḥ pūrvatantrē nirṇīyantē । ihāpi <quote>‘sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyayē
taddarśanā’</quote> <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—28)</ref> dityādau ārthavādikāni ca phalādīni vidhyapēkṣitāni
śāstradvayē'pi gr̥hyantē । tatsarvamarthavādānāṁ prayōjanamiti sākṣātpravr̥ttiviśēṣakaratvābhāvē-
'pi nātyantavaiyarthyamiti samabhivyāhr̥tavidhyēkavākyatvamākhyānānāṁ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। pāriplavārthā iti cēnna viśēṣitatvāt ।। 23 ।। tathā caikavākyatōpabandhāt ।। 24 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>upaniṣadāmnātānyapi sarvōpākhyānaśaṁsanasvānāt । ākhyānāni bhajēyuḥ pāriplavakarmaśēṣatvam ।। 299 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>vidyāvidhyupayuktānyētāni tadēkavākyatādr̥ṣṭēḥ । sarvākhyānavidhissa tu manvādyākhyānamātraparaḥ ।। 300 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti pāriplavādhikaraṇam ।। 4 ।।</head>
<pb n="396"/>
atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। ata ēva cāgnīndhanādyanapēkṣā ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
pūrvatrōpapāditō'ntyāśramasadbhāvaḥ । tasya vidyārthamādhānādyapēkṣā'sti na vēti
saṁśayaḥ ।। kiṁ tāvat prāptam ? vidyāṅgatvēna karmaṇō vidhānāt vidyāvatāmūrdhvarētasāṁ
vidyāṅgatvēnādhānādyanuṣṭhēyam । iti prāptē būmaḥ । na tēṣāmādhānādyapēkṣā vidyā ।
<quote>‘ētamēva pravrājinō lōkamicchantaḥ pravrajanti’</quote> ityādiśrutēstēṣāṁ karmatyāgēnaiva
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। ata ēva cāgnīndhanādyanapēkṣā ।। 25 ।।</pratika> stutividhiprasaṅgāgatamadhikaraṇadva-
yamapahāya <quote>‘parāmarśaṁ jaimini’</quote>rityadhikaraṇēna <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—18 sū॰)</ref> saṅgatiṁ darśayati---
<pratika>pūrvatrēti</pratika> । yajñādiśrutēḥ karmatyāgaśrutēśca saṁśayaḥ । ādhānādyapēkṣāyā<quote>‘mūrdhvarētassu cē’</quote>ti
puruṣārthādhikaraṇaguṇa <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—17)</ref> sūtrōktārthākṣēpāttēnāpi mūlabhūtādhikaraṇēnāsya
saṅgatiranusandhēyā । <pratika>ūrdhvarētasāmapīti</pratika> । yadyapi sannyāsinō vidhibalāt tyaktapūrvadā-
rāgnihōtrādayaḥ । tathāpi niraṅgēna vidyāmātrēṇa phalāniṣpattēraṅgabhūtayajñādyanuṣṭhānasyāvaśya-
katvāt । tadarthaṁ dārāntaraṁ parigr̥hyāgnyādhānaṁ kāryam । na ca dāraparigrahē satyūrdhvarētastvavi-
rōdhāpattiḥ । vidyāṅgakarmārthaṁ dāraparigrahē'pi bhīṣmavadūrdhvarētastvōpapattēriti caśabdēna
dyōtyatē । sō'ya<quote>‘mupāyanādadhīta hōmasaṁyōgā’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣarītyā pūrvapakṣaḥ ।
tatra hyupanayanāṅgahōmaḥ āhavanīyē kartavyaḥ । <quote>‘yadāhavaniyē juhvatī’</quote>tyaviśēṣaśravaṇāt ।
āhavanīyasiddha‍yarthaṁ cāgnaya ādhātavyāḥ । agnyādhānasiddha‍yarthaṁ dārasaṅgrahaśca kāryaḥ । a-
smin dārasaṅgrahē karmārthē satyapyupanayanapūrvakavidyāgrahaṇōttarakālavihitō dārasaṅgrahaḥ prajārthō
bhaviṣyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ kr̥taḥ । nacāśramadharmairēva vidyāyāssāṅgatvasiddhēryajñādyanuṣṭhānārthamā-
dhānadārasaṅgrahayōrākṣēpō na prāpnōtīti vācyam । <quote>‘yajñēnē’</quote>tyāditr̥tīyāśrutyā viśiṣya ya-
jñādīnāmapi vidyaṅgatvavidhānāt । karmatyāgaśrutistu vidyānaṅgakarmaviṣayā syāditi
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>karmatyāgēnaivēti</pratika> । tathā ca viśēṣavidhyanusārēṇa yajñādiśrutirgr̥hasthaviṣayā bhavi-
ṣyati । na ca yajñādiśrutyanusārēṇa karmatyāgaśrutirēva yajñāṅgakarmātiriktakarmaviṣayāstviti
vācyam । gr̥hasthairapi saṁsārādvirajya muktyarthāṁ vidyāmanutiṣṭhadbhiraihikāmuṣmikaphalasādha-
nānāṁ kāmyakarmaṇāṁ tyaktatvēna viśiṣya sannyāsināṁ karmatyāgavidhērvidyāṅgayajñādiparyanta-
tvasyāvaśyavaktavyatvāt । <quote>‘sarvārthatvācca putrārthē na prayōjayē’</quote>diti pūrvōdāhr̥tapūrvatantrādhi-
karaṇasiddhāntasūtrōktanyāyēna <quote>‘dharmē cārthē ca kāmē ca nāticaritavyē’</quote>ti smr̥tēḥ kēvalaṁ pu-
trārthamiva kēvalaṁ dharmārthamapi dārasaṅgrahāyōgācca । bhīṣmasya tu dharmaprajōbhayārthē dārasaṅgrahē
nirvr̥tta ēva pitr̥prītyarthamūrdhvarētasvapratijñayā putrōtpādanānnivr̥ttau satyāṁ dārāṇāṁ dharmārtha-
<pb n="397"/>
vidyāvattvāvagamāt । kiṁtu svāśramadharmāpēkṣā sā । tēṣāmādhānādyanupapattēriti ।।
iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।
atha sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sarvāpēkṣā ca yajñādiśrutēraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
pūrvādhikaraṇē nirūpitamantyāśramiṇāmanupapattērādhānādyanapēkṣā vidyēti । tadiha
gr̥hiṇāṁ vidyā tadapēkṣā na vēti saṁśayaḥ ।। ēvaṁ sati gr̥hasthānāmapi vidyā'gnī-
ndhanādikarmānapēkṣiṇīti brūmaḥ । tasya vyabhicārēṇa vidyāṅgatvānupapattēḥ । yattu
vimatā vidyā svāṅgabhūtakarmāpēkṣā aṅgitvāt prayājādyapēkṣadarśapūrṇamāsavat, itya-
numānam । tatrādhānādēḥ kīdr̥śamaṅgatvaṁ sādhyam ? prayājādivat phalōpakāritvaṁ vā,
avaghātādivat svarūpōpakāritvaṁ vā । nādyaḥ । tajjanyatvē muktēranityatvaṁ syāt ।
dvitīyē sādhyavikalō dr̥ṣṭāntaḥ । atō na vidyāṅgatvaṁ karmaṇaḥ । tasmāt gr̥hiṇā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
tvamātramavaśiṣṭamiti, tēna yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṁ । na tūrdhvarētastvapratijñānantaraṁ kēvalaṁ dharmārthadārasa-
ṅgrahēṇa śrutismr̥tisiddhānikētatvādisannyāsidharmaparyālōcanayāpi na sannyāsinō dārasaṅgra-
hādikamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ । sannyāsinaḥ svāśramadharmāstriṣavaṇasnānasamadhikaśaucāṣṭagrā-
sādayaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sarvāpēkṣā ca yajñādiśrutiraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</pratika> sannyāsināmiva gr̥hasthānāmaṣi
vidyā karmānapēkṣēti pūrvapakṣōtthānātsaṅgatiḥ । yajñādyabhāvē'pi vidyādarśanāt yajñādiśrutēśca
saṁśayaḥ । <pratika>vyabhicārēṇēti</pratika> । na ca ṣōḍaśigraharahitakratvapūrvāttatsahitakratvapūrvasyaiva karmara-
hitavidyātaḥ karmavadvidyāyā utkarṣaḥ kalpanīyaḥ muktērēkarūpatvēna । tathēha phalōtkarṣaprayō-
jakasya sādhanōtkarṣasya samarthayitumaśakyatvāt tadaprayōjakasya vidyōtkarṣasya saṁbhavatō'-
pyanuddēśyatvāt muktiphalajananakṣamasya vidyāmātrasya sannyāsināmiva karmabhirvināpi saṁ-
bhavē karmānuṣṭhānaklēśāyōgāditi bhāvaḥ । uktabhaṅgyā dūṣitamapyanumānaṁ prātisvikadōṣēṇa
dūṣayitumudbhāvayati---<pratika>yattviti । sādhyavikala iti</pratika> । <quote>‘nanvavaghātādyapēkṣadarśapūrṇamāsa-
va’</quote>diti dr̥ṣṭāntōpādānē sādhyavaikalyaṁ na bhaviṣyati । satyam । tathāpyāsanabandhaprāṇāyā-
mādibhiścittaikāgryasaṁpādanadvārā vidyāsvarūpanirvartakairarthāntaraṁ syāt । tasmādyajñādīnāṁ</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ataēvacāgnīndhanādyanapēkṣa ।। 25 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>atyāśramiṇāpi satā vidyārthatvēna kāryamādhānam । yajñādikarmaṇāṁ yadvidyāṅgatvaṁ samāmnātam ।। 301 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>nōkāryamētamēva pravrājina iti vidhānabalāt । vidyārthamēva karma tyaktavatassā hi na tadapēkṣēta ।। 302 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti agnīndhanādhikaraṇam ।। 5 ।।</head>
<pb n="398"/>
<p>mapi vidyā karmānapēkṣēti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। siddhāntastu---karmavatsu gr̥hasthēṣu vidyā'-
gnihōtrādisarvakarmāpēkṣā । <quote>‘yajñēna dānēna’</quote> iti śrutēḥ, yajñādīnāṁ pāramēśvaraniyō-
gasiddhatvācca । yathā'śvō gamanasādhanabhūtō'pi svaparikarabandhāpēkṣō gamanē, tathā
vidyā'pīti । karmaṇaḥ phalābhisandhirahitatvēna vidyāsvarūpōpakāryaṅgatvānna tajjanyatvaṁ
mōkṣaphalasya । kiṁtu sākṣāt jñānaphalamēva mōkṣaḥ । atō gr̥hasthānāṁ yajñādisāpēkṣā
vidyā । sarvēṣāmāśramiṇāṁ svāśramavihitakarmāpēkṣēti yuktaṁ vidyāyāḥ karmāpēkṣatvam ।।
iti sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
vidyāṅgatvāyōgā<quote>‘dyajñēnē’</quote>tyādiśrutirvidyāstutyarthā । vartamānāpadēśatvāt । dr̥śyatē hyatadartha-
syāpi tādarthyavarṇanaṁ stutyarthaṁ । <quote>‘yajñārthaṁ paśavassr̥ṣṭā’</quote>ityādau । atassannyāsibhiriva gr̥hasthai-
rapi vidyārthaṁ karma nānuṣṭhēyamiti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>pāramēśvaraniyōgasiddhatvāccēti ।</pratika> tathā ca para-
mēśvaraḥ svaniyōgānuvartanēna prasannassannāprāyaṇamaharaharavicchēdēnānuṣṭhēyāṁ vidyāṁ cittaikāgryā-
dipradānadvārā nirvartayēditi vidyāsvarūpōpakārakāṇi yajñādīnītyēvaṁ yajñādiśrutērarthavattva-
saṁbhavē nānarthakamarthavādatvamāśrayaṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ । yajñādīnāṁ vidyāvyabhicāraṁ pariharati
---<pratika>sarvōṣāmāśramiṇāmiti ।</pratika> yasminnāśramē sthitvā yō vidyāmanutiṣṭhati tasya tadāśramadha-
rmairvidyāsvarūpōpakāra iti niyamē nāsti vyabhicāraḥ । <quote>‘tamētaṁ vēdānuvacanēna brāhmaṇā vi-
vidiṣanti yajñēna dānēna’</quote>tyādiśrutērapyatraiva tātparyam । tatra <quote>‘vēdānuvacanēnē’</quote>ti brahmacāri-
dharmajātaṁ lakṣyatē । adhyayanārthamupakrāntamēva hi gurukulavāsamāprāyaṇamanuvartayēnnaiṣṭhikabra-
hmacārī । <quote>‘yajñēna dānēnē’</quote>tyanēna yajñadānapradhānaṁ gr̥hasthadharmajātaṁ lakṣyatē । <quote>‘tapasē’</quote>tyanēna
kr̥cchracāndrāyaṇapañcāgnimadhyatapaścaryādipradhānaṁ vaikhānasadharmajātam । <quote>‘anāśakēnē’</quote>tyanēna
anaśanaprāyāṣṭagrāsaniyamapradhānaṁ yatidharmajātaṁ lakṣyatē । ēvamāśramadharmabhēdē'pi tadupakā-
ryavidyābhēdō na prasajyatē । <quote>‘yasya yāvatsvagr̥hyōktaṁ bahu vā svalpamēva vā । tasya tāvati
śāstrārthē kr̥tē sarvaṁ kr̥taṁ bhavē’</quote>diti smr̥tyuktarītyā varṇāśramakulaviśēṣādiprayuktapāramēśvara-
niyōgānuvartanasyaikarūpaphalatvōpapattēriti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvāpēkṣā ca yajñādiśrutēraśvavat ।। 26 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>tarhyēva sēti vidyā gr̥hiṇāmapi na tadapēkṣēta । ēkasyāstadapēkṣānapēkṣatāyā viruddhatvāt ।। 303 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>yajñēnēti śravaṇāttasyāḥ karma hyapēkṣāsti । āśramabhidayā sā syādgamanasyāś‍va iva puṁbhidayā ।। 304 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti sarvāpēkṣādhikaraṇam ।। 6 ।।</head>
<pb n="399"/>
atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
sū ।। śamadamādyupētaḥ syāttathā'pi tu tadvidhēstadaṅgatayā tēṣāmapyavaśyā-
nuṣṭhēyatvāt ।। 27 ।।
<quote>‘śāntō dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhitō bhūtvā''tmanyēvātmānaṁ paśyēt’</quote> <quote>‘śra-
ddhābhaktidhyānayōgādavēhi’</quote> ityādinā vidyāyāḥ śamādisaṁpattyapēkṣā śrūyatē ।
sā śamādisaṁpattirgr̥hiṇāṁ saṁbhavati na vēti saṁśayaḥ ।। yajñādimattayā bahuvyā-
pāravyākulānāṁ tēṣāṁ taduparatirūpā śamadamādisaṁpattirna saṁbhavati iti prāptē
ucyatē---gr̥hasthō vihitakarmavyāpr̥tō'pi niṣiddhakāmyādikarmasu vyāpārarahitaḥ
śamādyupētaḥ syāt <quote>‘śāntō dāntaḥ’</quote> ityādinā <quote>‘śraddhābhaktidhyānayōgādavēhi’</quote>-
ityādinā ca śamādērvihitatvāt, vidyāniṣpattayē tadaṅgatvēna tēṣāmavaśyā-
nuṣṭhēyatvāt । āntarāṇāṁ rāgadvēṣādīnāmanāvirbhūtiḥ śamaḥ । sarvēṣāmindriyāṇā-
mavihitavyāpārēbhyō nivartanaṁ damaḥ । niṣiddhakāmyakarmavyāpārōparama uparatiḥ ।
dvandvasahiṣṇutvaṁ titikṣā । visr̥ṣṭatandrādivyākṣēpasya cittasya paratattvābhimukhyaṁ
samādhānam । apuruṣārthasakalētaraśāstraparāṅmukhī paravidyāmayaparamātmatantrōpani-
ṣadgōṣṭhīsamutkaṇṭhārūpā sattvakalā śraddhā । vinirmuktasakalētaradēvatārādhanā tri-
vidhakaraṇasaṁpādyā viśiṣṭāṣṭāṅgayōginī paramaśivaparicaryāmayī vaidikī kriyā
bhaktiḥ । paramānandāvēśamayamahāmōkṣalakṣmīdarśanatvarā mumukṣā । aihikāmuṣmika-
sakalabhōgaparāṅmusvatvarūpēṇa vairāgyēṇa nityānityavastunirdhāraṇākārēṇa vivēkēna
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। śamadamādyupētaḥ syāttathā'pi tu tadvidhēstadaṅgatayā tēṣāmapyavaśyānu-
ṣṭhēyatvāt ।। 27 ।।</pratika> pūrvādhikaraṇē vidyāṅgatvēna gr̥hasthānuṣṭhēyatayā vyavasthāpitairyajñādibhiḥ
śamādīnāṁ virōdhāvirōdhābhyāṁ saṁśayaḥ । śamādīnāṁ sarvavyāpārōparatirūpatayā yajñādibhi-
rvirōdhō'stīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । tēṣāṁ tattadāśramavihitadēhayātrōpayuktētarōparatirūpatayā nāsti
virōdha iti siddhāntaḥ । vidyāvirōdhināmantarindriyavyāpārāṇāmuparamaḥ śamaḥ । jñānēndriya-
vyāpārāṇāmuparamō damaḥ । karmēndriyavyāpārāṇāmuparama uparatiḥ । paramātmatantraṁ paramāptēna
śivēna praṇītaṁ sarvajñānōttarādiśivaśāstram । tatra viśiṣṭāni bhaktēraṣṭāṅgāni---<quote>‘madbhaktaja-
navātsalyaṁ pūjāyāñcānumōdanam । svayamabhyarcanaṁ caiva madarthē cāṅgacēṣṭanam ।। matkathāśra-
vaṇē prītiḥ svaranētrāṅgavikriyā । mannāmakīrtanaṁ nityaṁ mayi kaitavavarjana’</quote>miti śivēnaiva
nirūpitāni । <pratika>vaidikī kriyēti</pratika> । na tu tantrōktaprakārēti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṁ
prapadyē’</quote> ityādi śrutyuktādhikāriviśēṣaṇarūpāṁ mumukṣāmupāyamukhēna saṁbhāvayati---<pratika>aihi-
kēti ।</pratika> nityānityavastunirdhāraṇādanityēṣu viṣayēṣu vairāgyaṁ tataḥ śamādisampattyā mumu-
kṣēti kramaḥ ।। nanu <quote>‘yajñēnē’</quote>tyādiśrutivihitavidyāsādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṁ vidyānuṣṭhānāraṁbhā-
tprāgiti <quote>‘vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpī’</quote> tyadhikaraṇē bhāṣyakārō vakṣyati । śamādikaṁtu
cittaikāgryadvārā vidyāsvarūpōpakārakaṁ vidyānuṣṭhānāraṁbhaprabhr̥tyanuṣṭhēyam । atō yajñādēḥ
<pb n="400"/>
ca viśiṣṭasya śamādisaṁpattikramēṇa saṁbhavati mumukṣā । ētē vivēkādayō mumukṣā-
paryantāḥ paramadharmāḥ sarvēṣāmāśramiṇāṁ vidyārthamaviśēṣēṇānuṣṭhēyā iti ।।
iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।
atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyayē taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।।</sutra>
prāṇavidyāyāṁ paṭhyatē <quote>‘na ha vā ēvaṁvidi kiṁcanānannaṁ bhavati’</quote> iti । iha
prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasya sarvānnānumatiḥ pratīyatē । tadēṣā yuktā na vēti saṁśayaḥ ।। kiṁ
tāvat prāptam ? mānāntaraprāptasya bhōjanasyāvidhēyatvādiha sarvānnānumatiraprāptā
vidhīyatē । iti prāptē samādhīyatē । prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasyāpi sarvānnānumatirna sa-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
śamādēśca virōdhaśaṅkaiva nāstīti nēdamadhikaraṇamāraṁbhaṇīyamiti cēnmaivam । vidyāsādhanaṁ
karmasañjātamumukṣēṇā hi vidyōpāyasampattidvārā vidyālābhārthamanuṣṭhēyaṁ । tadānīmapi niṣi-
ddhakāmyarucivāsanānāṁ samūlōnmūlanārtha śamādikamanuṣṭhēyamiti virōdhaśaṅkāvataraṇāt
vidyāraṁbhaprabhr̥tyapi <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñcē’</quote>ti śrutivihitavidyāsahakārikarmānuṣṭhānasya vakṣyamā-
ṇatayā tēna saha śamādērvirōdhaśaṅkāvataraṇācca ।।</p>
<head>iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<head>atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyayē taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।।</pratika> yajñādīnāṁ śamādīnāñca
brahmavidyāśēṣatvamuktam । tatprasaṅgātsarvānnānumatēḥ prāṇavidyāśēṣatvamasti na vēti vicā-
ryatē । <quote>‘na havā’</quote> ityādividhistutyarthatvānavadhāraṇātsaṁśayaḥ । tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । adanasya
rāgaprāptatvē'pi tadāśritā sarvānnānumatiraprāptāprāṇavidyāṅgatvēna vidhīyatē । abhakṣyabhakṣaṇa-
niṣēdhastu puruṣārthatvānna tāṁ kratvarthāmāskandati । uṣasticaritadarśanamapi na tasyā bādha-
kam । uṣastērbrahmavidaḥ prāṇavidyāniṣṭhatvābhāvāt । brahmavidaśca <quote>‘nāviratō duścaritā’</quote>diti
śrutyā sakalaniṣiddhavyāvr̥ttēruktatvāditi । siddhāntastu, prāṇavidyāniṣṭhasyāpi sarvānnānuma-
tiritarasādhāraṇyēna prāṇātyaya ēva । <quote>‘na havā ēvaṁvi’</quote>dityādikaṁ, tu <quote>‘yatkiñcididamā
śvabhya āśakunibhya’</quote> iti vihitasyāśvādikaṁ sarvamidaṁ prāṇasyānnamityanucintanasya
phalārthavādamātram ।। na cāpūrvatvātpravr̥ttiviśēṣakaratvācca tatra vidhiriti yuktam । vidhi-
vibhaktēraśravaṇāt tatkalpanē ca pratyakṣasya sāmānyaniṣēdhaśāstrasyaparipanthitvāditi ava-</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। śamadamādyupētaḥ syāttathāpi tu tadvidhēstadaṅgatayā tēṣāmapyavaśyānuṣṭhēyatvāt ।। 27 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ēvaṁ tarhi śamādērvidhānamatyāśramiṣvēva । syādvidyārthaṁ gr̥hiṇāṁ yajñādivyāpr̥tēsyattvāt ।। 305 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>tēṣāmapi sa vidhāturniṣiddhakāryādiviṣayēṣu । śakyastataścasakalō vidyārthīśamadamādyupētaḥ syāt ।। 306 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti śamadamādyadhikaraṇam ।। 7 ।।</head><pb n="401"/>
rvadā, kiṁtu prāṇātyaya ēva । adhikaśaktēruṣastērbrahmavidō'pi hi prāṇātyaya ēvō-
cchiṣṭabhakṣaṇādau śrutirdr̥śyatē---<quote>“maṭacīhatēṣu kuruṣvāṭakyā saha jāyayā uṣastirha
cākrāyaṇa ibhyagrāmē pradrāṇaka uvāsa । sa hēbhyaṁ kulmāṣān svādantaṁ bibhikṣē ।
sa hōvāca, nētō'nyē vidyantē yacca yē ma imā upanihitā iti । ētēṣāṁ mē dē-
hīti hōvāca । tānasmai pradadau । hantānupānamiti । ucchiṣṭaṁ mē pītaṁ syāditi
hōvāca । na svidētē'pyucchiṣṭā iti ? na vā ajīviṣyamimānakhādanniti hō-
vāca kāmō ma udapānam ।।”</quote> ‘ityādirūpā । ataḥ prāṇātyaya ēva sarvānnānumatiḥ
paravidyāvatō'pīti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।।</sutra>
<quote>“āhāraśuddhau sattvaśuddhiḥ sattvaśuddhau dhruvā smr̥tiḥ । smr̥tilambhē sarvagranthīnāṁ
vipramōkṣaḥ।।”</quote> ityāhāraśuddhērabādhācca prāṇasaṁśaya ēva sarvānnānumatiḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 30 ।।</sutra>
prāṇasaṁśaya ēva sarvānnānumatiḥ smaryatē'pi---<quote>“prāṇasaṁśayamāpannō yō'nnamatti
yatastataḥ । lipyatē na sa pāpēna padmapatramivāmbhasā ।।”</quote>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dhāraṇārthēna sautracakārēṇa sūcitō'yaṁ vidhikalpanābādhakō hētuḥ । <quote>‘prāṇavidō'pi sarvā-
nnānumatiritaravatprāṇātyaya’</quote> ēvēti pratijñāyāṁ brahmavidō'pyēvaṁ kimuta prāṇavida iti kaimu-
tikanyāyahētvantarapradarśanārthaṁ <quote>‘taddarśanā’</quote>diti sūtraśēṣaṁ vyācaṣṭē---<pratika>adhikaśaktērityā-
dinā ।</pratika> maṭacyaḥ śakuniviśēṣāḥ । tābhirhatēṣu kuruṣu kurudēśasasyēṣu āṭakyā anupajāta-
stanādivyañjanayā jāyayā saha uṣastirha uṣastiriti nāmnā prasiddhaḥ ca cākrāyaṇaḥ cakra-
syāpatyam । ibhyagrāmē ibhamarhataḥ hastyārōhasya grāmē pradrāṇakaḥ annālābhātkutsitāṁ gatiṁ
gataḥ atyantakaṣṭāvasthāṁ prāptassannuvāsa mārgavaśātkasmiṁściddivasē uṣitavān । sa ha sa
kila kulmāṣān kutsitān māṣān jalapakvakullutthādikān vā khādantaṁ ibhyaṁ bibhikṣē ।
sa ha ibhyaḥ kila uvāca । itō'smānmayā bhakṣyamāṇāducchiṣṭakulmāṣarāśēranyē kulmāṣā
na vidyantē yacca yē yasmin rāśau mē madarthamupanihitāḥ bhakṣaṇārthaṁ prakṣiptā imē kulmāṣā
itō'nyē na vidyanta iti pūrvēṇa sambandhaḥ । ityukta uṣastiruvāca । ētēṣāṁ mē dēhi ētā-
nmahyaṁ dēhīti । tānasmā r̥ṣayē pradadau । pānāya samīpasthamudakaṁ gr̥hītvōvāca । hantēti
harṣē । anupānaṁ idamanupānamapi gr̥hāṇa ityukta r̥ṣiḥ pratyuvāca ucchiṣṭaṁ vai mē mayā pītaṁ
syāt yadīdamudakaṁ pibēyamityukta ibhyaḥ pratyuvāca na svidētē'pyucchiṣṭāḥ kimētē kulmāṣā
api nōcchiṣṭā iti । ēvamukta uṣastiruvāca । navā ajīviṣyaṁ naiva jīviṣyāmīmāna-
svādan kāmō ma udapānam icchātō mamōdakapānaṁ labhyata iti । ēvaṁ brahmavidyē'pyatyanta-
kaṣṭāvasthāyāmupyananyalabhyasya kulmāṣamātrasyōcchiṣṭasya grahaṇam anyalabhyasyōdakasya
pariharaṇaṁ ca dr̥ṣṭamityanyēṣāṁ ca sarvānnānumatiratyantakaṣṭāvasthāyāmēvēti kaimutikanyāyasi-
ddhamityupasaṁharati---<pratika>ata iti</pratika> ।। brahmavidanuṣṭhānēnaiva brahmavidviṣayavacanēnāpi kaimutika-
nyāyaḥ siddhyatītyāha---<pratika>sū॰ ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।।</pratika> sattvaśuddhirantaḥkaraṇaśuddhiḥ । dhruvāsmr̥tiḥ
nirantarasmr̥tisantānarūpadhyānalābhaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 30 ।।</pratika> sarvasādhāraṇa-
<pb n="402"/>
<sutra>sū ।। śabdaścātō'kāmakārē ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
tasmāt <quote>‘brāhmaṇaḥ surāṁ na pibēt’</quote> iti kāmakāranivr̥ttau śabdaśca bhavati । a-
taśca prāṇasaṁśaya ēva viduṣō'pi sarvānnānumatiḥ । anyathā niṣiddhācaraṇēna para-
mēśvarasyādrōhī syāditi bhāvaḥ ।।
iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।
atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
vidyāhīnasya gr̥hasthasyāśramakarma yajñādikaṁ <quote>‘yāvajjīvamagnihōtraṁ juhōti’</quote> iti
vihitatayā ca <quote>‘yajñēna dānēna’</quote> iti śrutērvidyāsādhanatayā cānuṣṭhēyamavagamyatē ।।
<sutra>sū ।। sahakāritvēna ca ।। 32 ।।</sutra>
vidyāvatō'pi <quote>‘vidyāṁ cāvidyāṁ ca’</quote> iti śrutērvidyāṅgatayā vihitatayā cānuṣṭhē-
yamavagamyatē । tadiha vidyāhīnēna vidyāvatā ca yajñādikaṁ vidyāyāssādhanatvēna
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
smr̥tibalādapyēvamiti bhāvaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। śabdaścātō'kāmakārē ।। 31 ।।</pratika> sarvānnānumati-
bādhanakṣamapratyakṣaśrutipradarśanārthamidaṁ sūtram । tasmā <quote>‘dbrāhmaṇaḥ surāṁ na pibē’</quote>diti śabdaḥ
kaṭhaśākhāyāṁ śrūyatē । kāmakāranivr̥ttāviti prayōjanasya nimittatvavivakṣayā saptamī ।
<pratika>ataścēti ।</pratika> sautraścakārō bhinnakramatayā yōjitaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<head>atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।।</pratika> vidyānuṣṭhānāraṁbhātprāktadāraṁbhaprabhr̥ti ca
yajñādīnāṁ dviranuṣṭhānaṁ sakr̥dvēti vicāraṁ pravartayiṣyan vicāraprasañjakaṁ <quote>‘vihitatvā’</quote>dityādi-
sūtradvayēna darśayati । yajñādikarmāśramakarmāpi bhavati । apiśabdādvidyāsādhanaṁ ca । <quote>‘yāva-
jjīvamagnihōtraṁ juhōtī’</quote>tyādi śrutyāśramadharmatvēna vihitatvāt cakārā <quote>‘dyajñēna dānēnē’</quote>-
tyādiśrutyā vidyāsādhanatvēna bōdhitatvāccētyasya sūtrasyārthaḥ ।। <pratika>sū॰ ।। sahakāritvēna
ca ।। 33 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vihitatvāccē’</quote>tyanuvartatē । vidyāraṁbhaprabhr̥ti yajñādikaṁ vidyāsahakāritvēnānu-
ṣṭhēyam cakārādāśramadharmatvēnāpyanuṣṭhēyam । <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñcē’</quote>ti śrutyā vidyāsahakāritvēna
bōdhitatvāt yāvajjīvādiśrutyāśramadharmatvēna vihitatvāccētyarthaḥ । ēvaṁ mumukṣōrvidyāraṁbhā-
tprāk vidyāraṁbhaprabhr̥ti ca yajñādiṣvadhikāradvitvē siddhē saṁśayaṁ pravartayati---<pratika>tadihēti</pratika> ।</p>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। sarvānnānumatiśca prāṇātyayē taddarśanāt ।। 28 ।। abādhācca ।। 29 ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 30 ।।
śabdaścātō'kāmakārē ।। 31 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṇavidassarvānnānumatau vidhirastyapūrvatvāt । sāmānyaniṣēdhaḥ khalu saṁkucitaḥ syādviśēṣavidhēḥ ।। 307 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>klr̥ptassāmānyavidhirviruddhavidhikalpanāṁ viśēṣē'pi । bādhēta tatassā syāt prāṇātyayagōcarā yathōṣastēḥ ।। 308 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti sarvānnānumatyadhikaraṇam ।। 8 ।।</head>
<pb n="403"/>
<p>aṅgatvēna vihitatvēna ca dviranuṣṭhēyaṁ sakr̥danuṣṭhēyaṁ vēti saṁśayē satyubhayavidhibalāt
dviranuṣṭhēyamiti prāptē siddhānta ucyatē---
<sutra>sū ।। sarvathāpi ta ēvōbhayaliṅgāt ।। 34 ।।</sutra>
ubhayatra viniyōgēnōbhayākāratvē'pi ta ēva yajñādayaḥ, sarvatra pratyabhijñānāt ।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
kiṁ vidyāhīnēna vidyāyāssādhanatvēna vihitatvēna ca dviranuṣṭhēyam । vidyāvatā ca vidyāṅga-
tvēna vihitatvēna ca dviranuṣṭhēyam uta vidyāhīnēna vidyāvatā ca sakr̥tsakr̥danuṣṭhēyamiti
saṁśayaprakāraḥ । yadyāśramadharmarūpādyajñādērvidyāsādhanaṁ yajñādikaṁ nityāgnihōtrātkauṇḍapāyi-
nāmayanāgnihōtramiva bhidyēta tadānīmāśramadharmarūpānmukhyādyajñādērvidyāsādhanaṁ gauṇaṁ yajñā-
dikaṁ pr̥thaganuṣṭhēyamiti mukhyagauṇātmakasya yajñādērdviranuṣṭhēyatvaṁ siddhyati । yadi <quote>‘yāvajjīva-
magnihōtraṁ juhōtī’</quote>ti śrutānnityāgnihōtrāt <quote>‘agnihōtraṁ juhuyātsvargakāma’</quote> iti śrutaṁ kā-
myāgnihōtramiva na bhidyēta tadā kāmyaprayōgānnityānuṣṭhānasiddhiriti prasaṅganyāyēna yajñā-
dikaṁ sakr̥dēvānuṣṭhēyaṁ siddhyati । atō'tra kiṁ nityāgnihōtramāsāgnihōtranyāyēna bhēdaḥ uta
nityāgnihōtrakāmyāgnihōtranyāyēnābhēdaḥ iti karmabhēdābhyāmayaṁ saṁśayaḥ । tatra pūrvapakṣamāha
---<pratika>ubhayavidhibalāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ---yuktamēkasyaivāgnihōtrasya nityatvēna kāmyatvēna
ca prayōgabhēdamātramiti yāvajjīvasvargakāmavākyayōrēkatraiva prakaraṇē śravaṇāt । <quote>‘yajñēnē’</quote>tyādi-
vākyasya <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñcē’</quote>ti vākyasya ca prakaraṇāntarē śravaṇāt māsāgnihōtranyāya ēva
pravartatē । na ca tatra <quote>‘juhōtī’</quote>ti hōmē vidhiḥ śrūyatē । atō vihitasya vidhānāyōgēna vi-
hitātprasiddhāgnihōtrahōmādasya hōmasyānyatvasiddhau tatra vartamānaṁ nāma tatparatantraṁ satprasi-
ddhāgnihōtrapratyabhijñāpakaṁ na bhavatīti tatra prakaraṇabhēdātkarmāntaratvamastu । iha tathā yajñā-
diṣu vidhirna śrūyatē । kintu vividiṣāyāmiti vācyam । atrāpīṣyamāṇavidyōddēśēna ya-
jñādikaṁ vidhēyamiti yajñādināmnō vidhēyaparatvēnāgnihōtranāmatulyatvāt । ētēna <quote>‘māsama-
gnihōtraṁ juhōtī’</quote>tyanupādēyē kālē vidhisaṁkramāyōgēna hōmasyaiva vidhēyatvaṁ vācyamiti vi-
hitasya vidhānāyōgāttatra karmabhēda iti nirastam । kālavatphalasyāpyanupādēyatvēnātrāpi
yajñādērēva vidhēyatvasya vācyatvātprasiddhasya yajñādēḥ prāptatvēna tasyāprāptō vidyāphalasaṁ-
bandhō bōdhayituṁ śakya ityētattu tatrāpi tulyam, prasiddhasyaivāgnihōtrasya māsaguṇasambandhō
bōdhayituṁ śakyata iti । tasmādanupādēyasambandhē karmaṇa ēva vidhyēyatvamiti māsāgnihōtra-
nyāyasyēhāpi tulyatvātprakaraṇāntarātkarmabhēdaḥ syādēvēti <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। sarvathāpi ta ēvōbha-
yaliṅgāt ।। 34 ।।</pratika> ubhayaliṅgādityasyōbhayatra karmaikyē pratyabhijñānarūpālliṅgādityarthamāha
---<pratika>sarvatra pratyabhijñānāditi</pratika> । ayamāśayaḥ---<quote>‘māsamagnihōtraṁ juhōtī’</quote>tyatra vidhēyaṁ ka-
rmāgnihōtrādanyadapi hōmarūpatayāvagamyata iti yuktam । tatrāgnihōtraśabdasya sādhyasādr̥-
śyāvalambanayā gauṇyā vr̥ttyā vartanam । iha tu yajñādiśabdōpāttaṁ karma yajñādēranyaccēttatkiṁrū-
pamityavagantuṁ na śakyatē । iṣṭipaśusōmādirūpāṇāṁ yajñādīnāṁ madhyē kēna yajñādinā sādr̥-
śyamavalambya pravr̥ttayā gauṇyā vr̥ttyā yajñādiśabdavr̥ttirityapyavagantuṁ na śakyatē । yajñā-
dināmnā dravyadēvatādyatidēśē sati dēvatōddēśyakadravyatyāgatvādirūpayajñādiśabdapravr̥ttini-
mittaprāptēranivāryatvēna yajñādibhinnatvamapi vidhēyasya karmaṇassamarthayituṁ na śakyatē । ta-
smādiha yajñādiśabdānāṁ <quote>‘yajñō'dhyayanaṁ dānamiti prathamaḥ, tapa ēva dvitīyaḥ ।’</quote><quote>‘bhōktāraṁ
yajñatapasāṁ sarvalōkamahēśvara’</quote>mityādiśrutismr̥tiṣviva prasiddhayajñādiparatvamēva yuktamiti ।।
<pb n="404"/>
ēvaṁ ca karmasvarūpaikyē sati saṁyōgapr̥thaktvanyāyēna na virōdhaḥ । sakr̥tprayōgē'pi
vacanadvayabalēna karmaṇa ēkasyāpyākāradvayōpapattēḥ । yathā <quote>‘svādirō yūpō bhavati---
khādiraṁ vīryakāmasya yūpaṁ kurvanti’</quote> ityatra vacanadvayabalēna nityatvaṁ kāmyatvaṁ cai-
kasya khādiratvasya, tadvat । tatō viduṣō'pyaviduṣō'pi vidyāṅgatayā vidyāhētu-
tayā vihitatayā ca sakr̥dēvānuṣṭhēyaṁ yajñādikamiti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। anabhibhavaṁ ca darśayati ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘dharmēṇa pāpamapanudati’</quote> iti śrutirvidyōtpattipratibandhakaduritanivartanēna vi-
dyāyā anabhibhavaṁ karmānuṣṭhānakāryaṁ ca darśayati । atō na pūrvōktavirōdhaḥ ।।
ityāśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
nanvēvamaikyapratyabhijñayā nityasyaiva yajñādēḥ kāmyatvēnānityatvāṅgīkārē virōdhaḥ syādityā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>saṁyōgēti</pratika> । <quote>‘ēkasya tūbhayatvē saṁyōgapr̥thaktvaṁ’</quote>miti jaiminisūtrōktanyāyassaṁ-
yōgapr̥thaktvanyāyaḥ । ēkasyānuṣṭhēyasya nityānityōbhayarūpatvē saṁyōgapr̥thaktvaṁ kāraṇamiti
tasya sūtrasyārthaḥ । siddharūpa ivānuṣṭhēyē vastuni nityatvānityatvayōrna vastukr̥tō virōdhō-
'sti ṣōḍaśigrahakartavyatvākartavyatvayōriva । viniyōjakapramāṇaikyē śabdakr̥tō virōdhaḥ
syāt । ēkasya vākyasyōbhayasambandhabōdhakatvāsaṁbhavāt । sō'pi nāsti । <quote>‘svādirō yūpaḥ’</quote>
<quote>‘svādiraṁ vīryakāmasyē’</quote>tyādiviniyōjakapramāṇabhēdasadbhāvāditi tasya sūtrasyābhiprāyaḥ ।।
nanu karmaikyē nityatvānityatvavirōdhābhāvē'pi nityārthaṁ phalārthaṁ ca dviḥprayōgaḥ syādityā-
śaṅkyāha---<pratika>sakr̥tprayōgē'pīti</pratika> । karmaikyavatprayōgaikyē'pi sati na virōdhaḥ kāmyānuṣṭhā-
nataḥ prasaṅgānnityārthasiddhēriti bhāvaḥ । karmaikyē pramāṇāntarasamuccayārthaṁ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।।
anabhibhavaṁ ca darśayati ।। 35 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘kaṣāyē karmabhiḥ pakvē tatō jñānaṁ pravartatē’</quote>ityādibhiḥ
karmaṇāṁ vidyāsādhanatvē vidyōtpattipratibandhakaduritanivr̥ttirdvāramitītyavagatam । tadēva
cāśramadharmāṇāṁ kāryamiti <quote>‘dharmēṇa pāpamapanudatī’</quote>ti śrutirdarśayati---atō vidyāpēkṣita-
dvārajanakatvēna klr̥ptasyaiva karmaṇō vidyāsādhanatvaṁ yuktamityapītō'pi karmaikyamavasīyata
iti bhāvaḥ । <pratika>atō na pūrvōktēti ।</pratika> ēvaṁ dr̥ḍhē karmaikyē nityatvānityatvavirōdhaḥ saṁyōgapr̥tha-
ktvanyāyēnaiva pariharaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñca yastadvēdōbhaym̐/?/saha । avi-
dyayā mr̥tyuṁ tīrvā vidyayā'mr̥tamaśnuta’</quote> iti mantrasyāyamarthaḥ---vidyāṁ brahmōpāsanāṁ avidyāṁ
tatsahakārikarmavr̥ndaṁ cēti tadubhayaṁ yaḥ saha vēda sahakārisahakāryabhāvēna yugapadanuṣṭhēyaṁ vēda
sa vidvānaharaharanuṣṭhīyamānēna tēna karmaṇā mr̥tyuṁ tīrvā vidyānuvr̥ttitadvaiśadyādipratibandha-
kaduritajātamabhibhūya vidyayā sākṣātkāraparyantayā muktiṁ prāpnōtīti ।।</p>
<head>ityāśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<sutra>sū॰ ।। vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpi ।। 32 ।। sahakāritvēna ca ।। 33 ।। sarvathāpi ta ēvōbhayaliṅgāt
।। 34 ।। anabhibhavaṁ ca darśayati ।। 35 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>prāṅjñānānuṣṭhānāttadicchatā tadanutiṣṭhatā vāpi। karma dviranuṣṭhēyaṁ sādhanasahakārinityabhāvēna ।। 309 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>karmaikamēva tāvadyajñādipratyabhijñānāt । karmaikyē sati kāmyānuṣṭhānānnityasiddhiḥ syāt ।। 310 ।।</l></lg>
<head>iti āśramakarmādhikaraṇam ।। 9 ।।</head>
<pb n="405"/>
atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍r̥ṣṭēḥ ।। 36 ।।</sutra>
uktamāśramiṇāṁ vidyā saṁpadyata iti । ihānāśramiṇāṁ vidyā saṁpadyatē na vēti
saṁdēhaḥ ।। anāśramiṇaḥ snātakā vidhurāśca, tēṣāṁ brahmavidyā na saṁbhavati, vidyāsā-
dhanabhūtānāmāśramadharmāṇāmabhāvāt ।। iti prāptē vadāmaḥ---raikvādiṣu vidyādarśa-
nādanāśramiṇāmapi vidyā saṁbhavatyēva ।। yaduktaṁ vidyāsādhanāśramadharmābhāvāditi,
tatrāha---
<sutra>sū ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 37 ।।</sutra>
anāśramiṇāmapi japādinā vidyānugrahaḥ smaryatē <quote>‘japyēnaiva tu saṁsidhyēdbrā-
hmaṇō nātra saṁśayaḥ । kuryādanyanna vā kuryānmaitrō brāhmaṇa ucyatē ।।’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। viśēṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।।</sutra>
āśramaniyatadharmaviśēṣēṇāpi vidyā'nugrahaḥ śrūyatē । <quote>‘tapasā brahmacaryēṇa śra-
ddhayā vidyayā cātmānamanviṣya’</quote> iti ।।
<sutra>sū ।। atastvitarajjyāyō liṅgācca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
anāśramitvāditaradāśramitvaṁ jyāyaḥ, dharmabhūyastvāt, ‘anāśramī na tiṣṭhēttu
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍r̥ṣṭēḥ ।। 36 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘vihitatvāccāśramakarmāpī’</quote>tyāśramakarmaṇāṁ
vidyāsādhanatvaṁ vidyāsahakāritvaṁ cōktam । tarhyanāśramiṇāmāśramakarmābhāvādvidyā na sampa-
dyata iti pūrvapakṣōtthānātsaṅgatiḥ । anāśramiṇāṁ vidyāsādhanasahakārikarmāsaṁbhavasaṁbhavābhyāṁ
saṁśayaḥ । yē gurukulātsamāvr̥ttau satyāmakr̥tadārasaṅgrahāḥ snātakāḥ yē ca mr̥tapatnīkā
vidhurāḥ tēṣāṁ vidyā na sampadyatē <quote>‘vividiṣanti yajñēnē’</quote>tyādiśrutāvāśramadharmāṇāmēva vidyā-
sādhanatvēna varṇitatvāt <quote>‘vidyāñcāvidyāñcē’</quote>ti śrutāvavidyāśabdasyāpi tatsamānanyāyatvē-
nāśramadharmaparatvāt āśramāniyatajapādimātrēṇa tēṣāṁ vidyānugrahāṅgīkārē bhūyasāmāśrama-
dharmāṇāmēva vidyāsādhanatvēna vidhānasya vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ । āśramān antarā
vartamānānāmapi snātakavidhurāṇāṁ vidyā sampadyata ēva । raikvādiṣu saṁvargavidyādidr̥ṣṭēriti
siddhāntaḥ ।। nanvanyārthadarśanarūpaliṅgamātraṁ na sādhakamiti pratipādakapramāṇapradarśanārthaṁ
sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 37 ।।</pratika> saṁsidhyēt brahmavidyāṁ labhata ityarthaḥ । nira-
pēkṣaprāpakapramāṇadarśanārthaṁ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। viśēṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।।</pratika> vidyārthaśramadha-
rmavidhivaiyarthyaparihārārthaṁ sūtram---<pratika>sū॰ ।। atastvitarajjyāyō liṅgācca ।। 39 ।। dharmabhūya-
stvāditi ।</pratika> tēnābilambitā vidyōtkarṣaprāptirlabhyata iti bhāvaḥ । liṅgādityētadvyācaṣṭē---
<pb n="406"/>
dinamēkamapi dvijaḥ’ iti smr̥tēśca । ēvamanāśramitvādāśramitvaṁ varamēva; tathā'pyā-
padviṣayē'nāśramiṇāmapi japyādisādhanēna vidyā saṁpadyata ēvēti ।।
iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tū nātadbhāvō jaiminērapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvēbhyaḥ ।। 40 ।।</sutra>
ihōrdhvarētasāṁ pūrvāśramāvarōhō'sti na vēti saṁdēhaḥ । <quote>‘brahmacaryaṁ samāpya gr̥hī
bhavēt gr̥hādvā vanī bhūtvā pravrajēt’</quote> ityāśramārōhō yatha svēcchādhīnastathā'varō-
hō'pi ।। iti prāptē siddhāntayāmaḥ---naiṣṭhikādibhūtasyātadbhāvaḥ tataḥ pracyutirna
saṁbhavati । kutaḥ ? niyamāt tadrūpābhāvēbhyaḥ । niyacchanti hi <quote>‘atyantamātmānamā-
cāryakulē'vasādayan’</quote> iti । <quote>‘araṇyamiyāt tatō na punarēyāt’</quote> iti <quote>‘saṁnyasyā-
gnīn na punarāvartayēt’</quote> iti ca śāstrāṇi niyacchanti । na cārōharūpaśāstravadava-
rōharūpaśāstrāṇi santi । atastēṣāmapracyutiniyamaśrutēḥ pracyutau śrutyādyabhāvācca
na tēṣāṁ vidyā'dhikāraḥ । jaiminērapyēvamēva matam ।। ārūḍhapatitasya prāyaścittā-
dinā vidyā'dhikārō nāstītyāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>anāśramīti । āpadviṣaya iti</pratika> । āśramāntaraprāptyupāyāsaṁpattiviṣaya ityarthaḥ ।।
iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।
atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
<pratika>sū ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tu nātadbhāvō jaiminērapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvēbhyaḥ ।। 40 ।।</pratika> ū-
rdhvarētasāmāśramaṁ prāpya punardāraparigrahaṁ kr̥tavatāṁ vidyādhikārō'sti na vēti vidyādhikāra-
viśēṣaṇabhūtaśāstrāparyudāsasampattyasaṁpattibhyāṁ saṁśayē pūrvapakṣēḥ । āśramāṇāmārōhavadavarō-
hō'pyastu nāma vr̥kṣāṇāmiva । tataśca dāraparigrahēṇa gārhasthyē sati vidyāṅgakarmabhūyastva-
mapi labhyata iti <quote>‘atastvitarajjyāyō liṅgāccē’</quote>ti nyāyaḥ pravartēta । yadi tu <quote>‘brahmacaryaṁ samāpya
gr̥hī bhavē’</quote>diti kramasyōktatvāt vyutkrē gr̥hasthāśramaprāptirna syāt tadānīṁ tēṣāṁ svāśrama-
pracyutānāmanāśramitvē'<quote>‘pyantarā cāpi tu tadda‍r̥ṣṭēriti’</quote> nyāyaḥ pravartēta । tasmādubhayathāpi
tēṣāṁ vidyādhikārō'stīti । nēti siddhāntaḥ । yatastadbha‍ūtasya ūrdhvarētasāmāśramaṁ prāptasya
nātadbhāvaḥ tadāśramaparityāgō nāsti । <quote>‘atyantamātmāna’</quote>mityādiśāstraistathā niyamanāt
atadrūpāpattau śāstrābhāvācca । tathā ca niyamōllaṅghanēna śāstraparyudastānāṁ nāsti vidyā-
dhikāra iti ।। nanu tarhyavaruhya kr̥taprāyaścittānāṁ tatrādhikārō'stvityāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṁ</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। antarā cāpi tu tadda‍r̥ṣṭēḥ ।। 36 ।। api ca smaryatē ।। 37 ।। viśēṣānugrahaśca ।। 38 ।। ata-
stvitarajjyāyō liṅgācca ।। 39 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>vidyāyāmadhikārō vidurādērnāstyanāśramiṇaḥ । vidyārthasyābhāvādāśramadharmasya kasyāpi ।। 311 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>raikvādiṣu tadda‍r̥ṣṭērasti tu tasyāpi tadadhikr̥tiḥ । tadanugrahaśca yuktō japaiśca sāmānyadharmaiśca ।। 312 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti antarādhikaraṇam ।। 10 ।।</head>
<pb n="407"/>
<p><sutra>sū ।। na cādhikārikamapi patanānumānāttadayōgāt ।। 41 ।।</sutra>
yadavakīrṇinō gardabhapaśvālambhanam <quote>‘avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvat’</quote> ityadhikārilakṣa-
ṇōktaṁ prāyaścittaṁ, tadapyārūḍhapatitasya na saṁbhavati---<quote>‘ārūḍhō naiṣṭhikaṁ dharmaṁ yastu
pracyavatē naraḥ । prāyaścittaṁ na paśyāmi yēna śuddhyētsa ātmahā ।।’</quote> iti tasya
prāyaścittānadhikārasmr̥tēstadasaṁbhavāt ।।
<sutra>sū ।। upapūrvamapītyēkē bhāvamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।।</sutra>
upapātakatvāt prāyaścittamapyēkē manyantē, madhvaśanaprāyaścittavat । taduktam---
<quote>‘uttarēṣāṁ caitadavirōdhi’</quote> iti । upakurvāṇasya yaduktaṁ tat svāśramāvirōdhyanyēṣāma-
pyāśramiṇāṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।।
<sutra>sū ।। bahistūbhayathā'pi smr̥tērācārācca ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
upapātakatvē mahāpātakatvē'pi karmādhikārādibahiṣkr̥tā ētē, ‘prāyaścittaṁ na
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<pratika>sūtram ।। sū॰ ।। na cādhikārikamapi patanānumānāttadayōgāt ।। 41 ।।</pratika> avakī-
rṇipaśuśca tadvaditi । pūrvatantrē adhikārādhyāyē yadadhikaraṇaṁ tatrāvakīrṇiprāyaścittarūpa-
paśubandhaprakāraścintitaḥ । avakīrṇipaśuḥ sthapatīṣṭivallaukikāgnau kartavyaḥ niṣādasthapatē-
riva brahmacāriṇō'pyādhānāsaṁbhavāditi । ēvaṁbhūtaṁ prāyaścittamapi tēṣāṁ nāsti । <quote>‘ārūḍhō
naiṣṭhikaṁ dharma’</quote>miti vratabhraṣṭānāṁ patitatvasmaraṇēna prāyaścittānarhatvādityarthaḥ । atō'vakī-
rṇiprāyaścittasmaraṇamupakurvāṇabrahmacāriviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ <pratika>।। sū॰ ।। upapūrvamapītyēkē bhā-
vamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।।</pratika> ēkē ācāryāḥ naiṣṭhikādīnāṁ brahmacaryapracyavanamupapātakaṁ na
tu mahāpātakaṁ tēṣvaparigaṇanāditi manyamānā madhvaśanasyēva prāyaścittasadbhāvaṁ manyantē ।
tathaiva smr̥tāvuktamityarthaḥ । gautamasmr̥tau upanayanādirniyama ityārabhyōpakurvāṇasya niya-
mānvidhāyātidiṣṭam <quote>‘uttarēṣāṁ caitadavirōdhī’</quote>ti । upakurvāṇasya yāvanniyamajātamuktaṁ tatra
yaduttarēṣāmāśramāṇāṁ virōdhi yathā gr̥hasthasya bhaikṣacaraṇaṁ sannyāsinō'gnīndhanamityādi ta-
tparityajyānyatsarvaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ । ēvañcōpakurvāṇasyōktaṁ gardabhapaśvālambhanaṁ naiṣṭhikasyāpi
bhavati । vānaprasthasannyāsinōstu kr̥cchracāndrāyaṇādikaṁ viśiṣya vihitaṁ prāyaścittaṁ bha-
vati । yattu <quote>‘prāyaścittaṁ na paśyāmī’</quote>ti smaraṇaṁ tadda‍urbalam । vilambitatvāt । adarśanēna hi
prāyaścittābhāvō'numēyaḥ । tēna niṣēdhaśrutiḥ kalpanīyēti । atastatsmaraṇaṁ prāyaścittagaura-
vakhyāpanārthamiti na tadvirōdha iti bhāvaḥ ।। ēvaṁ ca kr̥taprāyaścittānāṁ tēṣāṁ vidyādhikā-
rō'stviti śaṅkāsūtramētat---<pratika>sū॰ ।। bahistūbhayathāpi smr̥tērācārācca ।। 43 ।।</pratika> pā-
pānāṁ dvē śaktī । iha karmādhikāraśiṣṭasaṁsargavirōdhinī paratra narakāpādinī ca । naiṣṭhikānāṁ
prāyaścittasadbhāvē'pi tēna paratra narakāpādinyava pāpaśaktirhīyatē na tviha pratyāpattyāpā-
<pb n="408"/>
paśyāmi yēna śuddhyēt sa ātmahā’ iti smr̥tēḥ, śiṣṭabahiṣkārācca । ataḥ sarva-
thaivārūḍhapatitānāṁ na vidyā'dhikāraḥ ।।
iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।
atha svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। svāminaḥ phalaśrutērityātrēyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</sutra>
uktamudgīthādyupāsanam । tadanuṣṭhānaṁ yajamānasya, uta r̥tvijāmiti saṁśayaḥ ।।
kiṁ prāptam ? udgīthādyupāsanaṁ yajamānasyaivānuṣṭhēyam, tasyaiva vīryavattaratvaphalaśrava-
ṇāt, nartvijāmityātrēyamatam ।। siddhānta ucyatē---
<sutra>sū ।। ārtvijyamityauḍulōmistasmai hi parikriyatē ।। 45 ।।</sutra>
<quote>‘ēvaṁvidudgātā brūyāt’</quote> iti vākyaśēṣē udgāturupāsakatvaṁ sphuṭaṁ śrūyatē । ā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
dinī । <quote>‘nāsyāsmil‍m̐lōkē pratyāpattirvidyatē kalmaṣaṁ tu nirhaṇyatē’</quote> <quote>‘prāyaścittairapaityēnō yada-
jñānakr̥taṁ bhavēt । kāmatō vyavahāryastu vacanādiha jāyata’</quote>ityādismaraṇāt । ataḥ <quote>‘prāya-
ścittaṁ na paśyāmī’</quote>tyādismaraṇamapyaihikapratyāpattyāpādakaprāyaścittābhiprāyamiti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<head>atha svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। svāminaḥ phalaśrutērityātrēyaḥ ।। 44 ।।</pratika> upāsanānuṣṭhātr̥vicāraprasaṅgāgatamidama-
dhikaraṇam ।। phalasya kartr̥gāmitvāt r̥tvikparikrayācca saṁśayaḥ । <pratika>tasyaivēti</pratika> । r̥tvikpari-
krayasyāṅgānuṣṭhānārthatvāt pr̥thakphalavadupāsanaṁ pradhānamiti phalārthinā yajamānēnaivōpāsanaṁ
kāryaṁ gōdōhanādēḥ pr̥thakphalatvē'pi r̥tvikkartr̥kapraṇayanādityāśritasya pr̥thakkr̥tya yajamānē-
nōpādātumaśakyatvāt na yājamānatvam । upāsanānāṁ tu kriyārūpāṇāmudgīthādibhyaḥ
pr̥thakkr̥tya yajamānēna kartuṁ śakyatvāt pradhānatvācca yājamānatvamēva yuktam । audgātrasamā-
khyādikaṁ tu <quote>‘śāstraphalaṁ prayōktarī’</quote>ti nyāyavirōdhānnādaraṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ<pratika>।। sū॰ ।।
ārtvijyamityauḍulōmistasmai hi parikriyatē ।। 45 ।।</pratika> <quote>‘ēvaṁvidudgātā brūyāt । kaṁ tē
kāmamāgāyānītyēṣa hyēva kāmāgānasyēṣṭē ya ēvaṁvidvāntsāma gāyatī’</quote>ti । <quote>‘ya ēṣō'ntarā-
dityē hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣō dr̥śyata’</quote> ityādyudgīthavidyāprakaraṇē śrūyatē । ēvaṁvidantarādityē'ntara-</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। tadbha‍ūtasya tu nātadbhāvō jaiminērapi niyamāttadrūpābhāvēbhyaḥ ।। 40 ।। nacādhikārikamapi
patanānumānāttadayōgāt ।। 41 ।। upapūrvamapītyēkē bhāvamaśanavattaduktam ।। 42 ।। bahistūbhayathāpi
smr̥tērācārācca ।। 43 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>ārōhavadavarōhānumatyabhāvē'pi cāśramiṇām । avaruhya kr̥taniṣkr̥tiradhikārī bhavatu vidyāyām ।। 313 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>patitasyāsya na niṣkr̥tirasti tu yadi cōpapātakatvēna । vidyādhikārabāhyasmr̥tyācārāttathāpyēṣaḥ ।। 314 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti tadbha‍ūtādhikaraṇam ।। 11 ।।</head>
<pb n="409"/>
<p>rtvijyamēva tadanuṣṭhānamityauḍulōmimatam । kathamanyakartr̥kamanyagāmiphalaṁ syāditi
cēt, r̥tvijāṁ karmasvarūpavadaśēṣāṅgānuṣṭhānāya yajamānēna krītatvāt । sāṅgakarmā-
nuṣṭhānāya hi r̥tvijō yajamānēna parikriyantē । tasmādr̥tvikka‍r̥taṁ yajamānakr̥tamē-
vēti, phalaṁ ca tasya svāmina ēvēti na virōdhaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti svāmyadhikaraṇam ।। 12 ।।</head>
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<p>kṣiṇi cōpadiṣṭaṁ paramēśvarasvarūpaṁ sarvapāpōditatvādidharmaiḥ dēvalōkakāmāvāptimanuṣyalōkakā-
māvāptirūpaphalābhyāṁ ca saha vidvānudgātā yajamānaṁ prati brūyāt । kiṁ tē kāmamaihikamāmu-
ṣmikaṁ vā kiṁ phalamuddiśya āgāyāni tatphalānukūlōpāsanāsahitaṁ gānaṁ karavāṇīti ।
hi yasmādēva ēvōdgātā kāmāgānasyābhimataphalasādhanōpāsanāsahitagānasyēṣṭē । kaḥ । ya ēvaṁ-
vidvān adhidaivatādhyātmōpadiṣṭaparamēśvarasvarūpaṁ vidvān sāma gāyatītyarthaḥ । atrōdgātr̥-
kartr̥kamēva vēdanamiti spaṣṭam । ēvaṁ <quote>‘yadēva vidyā karōti’</quote> <quote>‘ya ētadēvaṁvidvān sāma gāya-
tyubhau sa gāyatī’</quote>tyādikamapyudāharaṇam । na ca yāgadānādīnāṁ phalavatāṁ yajamānakartr̥-
katvē prādhānyaṁ prayōjakam । kiṁ tu yajamānasya dravyē svatvatyāgō nānyēna kartuṁ śakya
ityētatprayōjakam । ata ēvāṅgatvē'pi dakṣiṇādānaṁ yājamānam । ēvaṁ ca yadr̥tvigbhiḥ
kārayituṁ śakyaṁ tasya sarvasyāpyarthē r̥tvijāṁ parikrītatvādaudgātrādisamākhyānusārācca
udgīthādyupāsanamudgātrādibhirēva kartavyam । tadidaṁ hētvantaraṁ <quote>‘tasmai hi parikriyata’</quote> iti
sūtraśēṣēṇa kaṇṭhōktam । tatsūtraśēṣaṁ śaṁkōttaratvēnāpi yōjayati---<pratika>kathamanyakartr̥kamiti</pratika> ।
‘sāṅgakarmānuṣṭhānāyētyanēna pradhānyaṁ yajamānakartr̥katvē prayōjakaṁ na bhavati । parikrayasya
dr̥ṣṭārthatvāya sarvamapi r̥tvigbhirēva kartavyamityussargō darśitaḥ । ata ēva <quote>‘nirdēśācchē-
ṣabhakṣō'nyaiḥ pradhānava’</quote>diti pūrvatantrādhikaraṇē śaṁyuvākakālakartavyaṁ haviśśēṣabhakṣaṇaṁ
r̥tvigbhyō'nyaiḥ kartavyam । sarvēṣvapi bhakṣaṇēṣu r̥tvigyajamānakartavyatvēna prāptēṣu <quote>‘yajamā-
napañcamā iḍāṁ bhakṣayantī’</quote>ti tairiḍābhakṣaṇamēva kāryamiti parisaṁkhyātatvāditi pūrvapakṣaṁ
kr̥tvā tadvacanamr̥tvijāṁ bhakṣaṇāntaranivr̥ttyarthaṁ na bhavati । kiṁ tu sarvatrāpi prayōgē kartr̥-
tvēna prāptānāmr̥tvijāmēvēḍābhakṣaṇamiti yajamānasyāprāptau tatprāptyartham । ataḥ śaṁyuvāka-
kālabhakṣaṇamr̥tvigbhiḥ kartavyamiti siddhāntitam । ēvaṁ yatra vacanēna yājamānasamākhyayā
nyāyēna vā yajamānasya kartr̥tvaṁ prāpnōti tatraivōtsargasyāpavādaḥ । anyatra sarvatra r̥tvi-
jāmēva kartr̥tvamityudgīthādyupāsanāsvapi tathaivēti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>

atha sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 93 ।।
<sutra>su ।। sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣēṇa tr̥tīyaṁ tadvatī vidhyādivat ।। 46 ।।</sutra>
kahōlabrāhmaṇē śrūyatē---<quote>‘tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṁ nirvidya bālyēna tiṣṭhāsēt
bālyaṁ ca pāṇḍityaṁ ca nirvidyātha muniḥ’</quote> iti bahūpaniṣattātparyanirṇayarūpaṁ pā-
ṇḍityaṁ niśśēṣēṇa saṁpādya bālyēna rāgadvēṣādirahitatvāt bālyasadr̥śēnāvasthānta-
rēṇāvatiṣṭhēta । tataḥ pāṇḍityabālyē niśśēṣaṁ saṁpādyātha muniḥ iti । atra pā-
ṇḍityabālyavanmaunamapi vidhīyatē na vā । iti saṁśayē munirityatra bhavēdityādi-
vidhiprayōgābhāvānna vidhīyatē ।। iti prāptē'bhidhīyatē---vidyāvatō yajñādivat
pāṇḍityabālyayōstr̥tīyaṁ sahakāryantaraṁ maunaṁ vidhīyata ēva, prakr̥ṣṭamananaśīlē mu-
niśabdasya prasiddhēḥ । vidyāniṣpattyarthamupāsyaviṣayābhyāsarūpamidaṁ prakr̥ṣṭamananaṁ
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
<head>atha sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣēṇa tr̥tīyaṁ tadvatō vidhyādivat ।। 46 ।।</pratika> yajñā-
dīnāṁ śamādīnāṁ ca vidyāsahakāriṇāṁ nirūpaṇānantaraṁ saṁgativiśēṣaprāptāṁ sarvānnānumatyā-
dicintāṁ kr̥tvā punarapi vidyāyāmēva sahakāryantaraṁ nirūpyata iti saṁgatiḥ । rāgaprāptatvēna
śravaṇamananayōravidhēyatvasya prathamādhikaraṇabhāṣyē nirūpitatvādiha tayōrvidhiśravaṇaṁ tēna
virudhyētētyāśaṅkya pāṇḍityabālyaśabdayōrarthāntaramāha---<pratika>bahūpaniṣaditi</pratika> । ūhāpōhakṣa-
mādiḥ paṇḍā sāsya sañjātēti paṇḍitaḥ tasya karma pāṇḍityaṁ śravaṇamananānantaraṁ tadabhyāsa-
pāṭavavaśāllabdhayā ūhāpōhakṣamayā navanavōnmēṣaśālinya pratibhayā śrutamatārthānukūlyēna
sakalōpaniṣattātparyapratiṣṭhāpanaṁ pāṇḍityaṁ tadanukūlapratibhāśaktau satyāmapi bālavadrāgadvēṣa-
svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanāhaṁkārādirāhityaṁ bālyaṁ tadubhayaṁ śravaṇamananānantarabhāvividyāsaha-
kāritvēna vidhēyamiti sampratipannamēva । iha punaratha munirityuktaṁ tr̥tīyamapi sahakāryantaraṁ
vidhīyatē na vēti vidhyarhatvānarhatvābhyāṁ saṁśayē śravaṇamananabālyapāṇḍityēbhyō'nyasya vi-
dhyarhasya kasyacidadarśanādvidhiśabdāśravaṇācca na vidhīyatē kiṁ tu mananamēvānūdyata iti
prāptē sautrapadāni vyācakṣāṇa ēva siddhāntayati---<pratika>vidyāvata iti</pratika> । tadvata ityasya vyā-
khyānamidam ।<quote>‘vidhyādiva’</quote>dityasya vyākhyānaṁ---<pratika>yajñādivaditi । vidhīyata iti</pratika> ।
vidhiryajñādiḥ śamādiśca । ādiśabdēna vidhisarūpavākyābhyāmanūditaṁ śravaṇaṁ mananaṁ ca
gr̥hyatē । tr̥tīyaśabdasyāvadhyapēkṣāpūraṇaṁ <pratika>pāṇḍityabālyayōriti</pratika> । tr̥tīyaśabdasāmānā-
dhikaraṇyēna sahakāryantaravidhipadavyākhyānam---<pratika>sahakāryantaramiti</pratika> । vidhīyata iti
vidhiḥ । sahakāryantaraṁ cāsau vidhiścēti samānādhikaraṇasamāsa iti bhāvaḥ । <quote>‘pakṣēṇē’</quote>ti
padaṁ sādhyāhāraṁ vyācaṣṭē---<pratika>prakr̥ṣṭēti</pratika> । mananamātraṁ na muniśabdasya pravr̥ttinimittaṁ kiṁ tu
prakr̥ṣṭaṁ mananam । prakarṣaśca mananasya snēhapūrvakatayā ciravirahitāyā nāyikāyāḥ nāyaka-
viṣayasyēva nirantaramanuvartamānatvarūpa iha pakṣēṇētyanēnādhyāhāryapadayuktēna vivakṣita iti
bhāvaḥ । tamēvaṁ prakarṣaṁ darśayati---<pratika>vidyāniṣpattyarthamiti</pratika> । yasyōpāsanānuṣṭhānakālavyati-
riktakālēṣvapi gacchatastiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya vā upāsyaviṣayā cintānuvartatē । tasyaivōpā-
<pb n="411"/>
tiṣṭhāsēditi padānuvr̥ttyā vidhīyatē । tatō maunavidhiḥ saṁbhavati vidyāvata iti ।।
iti sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।
atha kr̥tsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। kr̥tsnabhāvāttu gr̥hiṇōpasaṁhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
iha sarvēṣāmāśramāṇāṁ vidyā sādhāraṇī, uta viśēṣō'stīti saṁśayaḥ ।। brahma-
cāriṇō vēdābhyāsē ācāryaparavaśatvāt gr̥hasthasya kuṭumbabharaṇāyāsitvāt vana-
sthasya vaikhānasadharmavyāpr̥tatvānna tēṣāṁ jñānadhyānē saṁbhavataḥ । <quote>‘vēdāntavijñānasu-
niścitārthāssannyāsayōgādyatayaśśuddhasattvā’</quote> iti vēdāntārthajñānavatāṁ sannyāsa-
yōgaśravaṇāt <quote>‘antyāśramasthaḥ’</quote> iti dhyānavidhau darśanāccāntyāśramiṇāmēva jñāna-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
sanākālē'pi tadviṣayacittaikāgryādvidyā dr̥ḍhībhavati । yasya tūpāsanākālē yathākathaṁci-
dvidyānuṣṭhānē'pi samayāntarēṣu cintāntarāvēśaḥ tasyōpāsanānuṣṭhānakālē'pi cētasi sama-
yāntaracintitaviṣayāntarānupravēśādvidyā na dr̥ḍhībhavēdityupāsyaviṣayābhyāsō'pi vidyā-
sahakārītyēvaṁrūpaṁ prakr̥ṣṭaṁ mananamēva <quote>‘atha muni’</quote>rityatra vidhīyatē । śravaṇapratiṣṭhārthasya manana-
mātrasya prāgēva nirvr̥ttatvēna tatrāthaśabdānanvayā<quote>‘ttiṣṭhāsē’</quote>diti padānuvr̥ttyā mananasya vidhē-
yatvasaṁbhavāccēti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>
<head>iti sahakāryantaravidhyadhikaraṇam ।। 13 ।।</head>
<head>atha kr̥tsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><pratika>sū॰ ।। kr̥ts‍nabhāvāttu gr̥hiṇōṣasaṁhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</pratika> yadi vidyādārḍhyārthamupāsakānāṁ
cētasassarvadōpāsyaprāvaṇyēna bhāvyaṁ tarhi sannyāsināmēva vidyāsvadhikāraḥ syāt nētarēṣāmiti
pūrvapakṣōtthānātsaṅgatiḥ । itarēṣāṁ sārvadikōpāsyaprāvaṇyasaṁbhavāsaṁbhavābhyāṁ saṁśayaḥ । itarēṣāṁ
tattadāśramavihitakarmānuṣṭhānavaiyagryamāvaśyakamiti tadasaṁbhavēna pūrvapakṣaḥ । sannyāsayōgā-
dityādiśravaṇaṁ ca tadupōdbalakam । <quote>‘atyāśramasthaḥ sakalēndriyāṇi nirudhya bhaktyā svaguruṁ
praṇamyē’</quote>ti kaivalyōpaniṣatpāṭhaḥ prasiddhaḥ । na <quote>‘tvantyāśramastha’</quote> iti । atyāśramasthastu <quote>‘agni-
rityādibhirmantrairbhasmanōddha‍ūlanaṁ tathā । tripuṇḍradhāraṇaṁ caiva vadantyatyāśramaṁ budhā’</quote> iti purā-
ṇōktalakṣaṇassarvāśramasādhāraṇaḥ । tasmā<quote>‘dantyāśramastha’</quote> iti dhyānavidhau <quote>‘darśanāccē’</quote>ti</p>

<lg><l>atha munirityatra vidhēraśravaṇād jñānamavidhēyam । pāṇḍityaśabditaṁ yajjñānaṁ vihitaṁ tadanuvākyam ।। 317 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>pāṇḍityādyanuviditaṁ prakr̥ṣṭamananātmakaṁ maunam । dhyānē tadakālēṣvapi sahaśīlanamambikāsahāyasva ।। 318 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>pāṇḍityabālyayōstu tr̥tīyamadhikāriṇō...ṣaḥ । vidyāsahakāritayā yajñādikavadvidhēyamiha maunam ।। 399 ।।</l></lg></p>

<pb n="412"/>
<p>dhyānē, nāparēṣāmiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ।। sarvēṣvāśramēṣu vidyā saṁbhavatyēva । chāndōgyē
<quote>‘kuṭumbē śucau dēśā svādhyāyamadhīyānaḥ’</quote> ityārabhya <quote>‘sa khalvēvaṁ vartayan yāvadāyuṣaṁ
brahmalōkamabhisaṁpadyatē na ca punarāvartatē’</quote> iti kr̥ts‍nāśramēṣu vidyāsadbhāvapradarśa-
nāt । tatra gr̥hiṇōpasaṁhāraḥ sarvēṣāṁ pradarśanārthaḥ । ēvamantyāśramavacanamapi sarvē-
ṣāmāśramāṇāṁ pradarśanārtham । ataḥ sarvēṣāmāśramiṇāṁ vidyā'styēva । phalatyāgaḥ
sannyāsaḥ । yatitvaṁ jitēndriyatvam । sarvamidaṁ sarvēṣāṁ saṁbhavatyēva ।।
iti kr̥tsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।
atha maunavadadhikaraṇam ।। 15 ।।
<sutra>sū ।। maunavaditarēṣāmapyupadēśāt ।। 48 ।।</sutra>
atharvaśirasi śrūyatē---‘tr̥ṣṇāṁ chittvā hētujālasya mūlaṁ buddha‍yā saṁcintya sthā-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhāṣyaṁ śākhāntarapāṭhābhiprāyaṁ draṣṭavyam । ēvañcāśramadharmāṇāṁ vidyāsādhanatvavacanāni vi-
dyārambhaprākkālānuṣṭhēyakarmaviṣayāṇi na tu vidyārambhaprabhr̥tyanuṣṭhēyakarmaviṣayāṇyapīti pūrvapakṣā-
bhiprāyaḥ ।। nanu chāndōgyē gr̥hiṇāmēva phaladvārā vidyāsadbhāvaḥ pradarśitō na tu naiṣṭhikavai-
khānasayōrityāśaṅkyāha---<pratika>tatra hīti</pratika> । yajñādibahuvyāpāravyagrēṇa gr̥hiṇōpasaṁhāraḥ kaimu-
tikanyānēna sarvēṣāṁ pradarśanārthaḥ । sarvēṣvāśramēṣu mumukṣādividyādhikāriviśēṣaṇasaṁbhavēna
vidyādhikārasadbhāvāt sarvēṣāmāśramiṇāṁ svasvāśramavihitakarmānuṣṭhānārthavaiyagryagrastakāla-
vyatiriktakālēṣūpāsyaviṣayacētassamādhānasaṁbhavācca karmānuṣṭhānavaiyagryasya cētassamādhā-
navirōdhiduritanivr̥ttyarthatvēna tasyōpāsanākālapēkṣitacētassamādhānavirōdhitvāprasaṅgāccēti
bhāvaḥ । <pratika>ēvamantyāśramavacanamapīti</pratika> । yathā <quote>‘jāyamānō vai brāhmaṇastribhirr̥ṇavā jāyatē ।
tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṁ nirvidya tamēvaṁ vēdānuvacanēna brāhmaṇā vividiṣantī’</quote>tyādiṣu brāhma-
ṇagrahaṇamadhikāriviśēṣavattvāviśēṣāt kṣatriyavaiśyayōrapyupalakṣaṇam । ēvamihāpīti bhāvaḥ ।
<quote>‘sannyāsayōgādyataya’</quote>ityatra tu nāśramāntaravyavacchēdaśaṅkētyāha---<pratika>phalatyāga iti</pratika> । <quote>‘kā-
myānāṁ karmaṇāṁ nyāsaṁ sannyāsaṁ kavayō vidu’</quote>riti gītāvacanāt । <quote>‘yē nirjitēndriyagrāmā
yatinō yatayaśca ta’</quote> iti kōśakāravacanāccēti bhāvaḥ ।।</p>

ēkamatharvaśiraḥkālāgnirudrōpaniṣadādiṣu śrutaṁ bhasmōddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇamātrarūpam । tatsa-</p>

<head>nayamaṇimālāyām</head>
<head>atha kr̥tsnabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<p><sutra>sū॰ ।। kr̥tsnabhāvāttu gr̥hiṇōpasaṁhāraḥ ।। 47 ।।</sutra>
<lg><l>na gr̥hī vidyādhikr̥taḥ karmakuṭuṁbabhr̥tivaiyagryāt । nācāryakulanivāsī paratantratvādamuṣyāpi ।। 320 ।।</l></lg>
<lg><l>kr̥tsnēṣvapyāśramiṣu syādvidyākarmaṇāṁ chidrē । ata ēva hi chāndōgyē dr̥ṣṭō gr̥hiṇōpasaṁhāraḥ ।। 321 ।।</l></lg></p>
<head>iti kr̥ts‍nabhāvādhikaraṇam ।। 14 ।।</head>
<pb n="413"/>
<p>payitvā ca rudrē । rudra ēkatvamāhuḥ । rudraṁ śāśvataṁ vai purāṇāmiṣamūrjaṁ tapasā niya-
cchata vratamētat pāśupatam’ iti । tat pāśupatavratamatharvaśirasi śrutaṁ purāṇēṣu ca
prasiddhamēva । tanniṣṭhānāṁ vidyāprāptirmuktiśca saṁbhavati na vēti saṁśayaḥ ।। kiṁ prā-
ptam ? āśramēṣvanantarbhāvāt, avasānadarśanāt, putrādyarthaṁ kr̥ṣṇādibhiranuṣṭhita-
tvāt avāntaraphalasiddhimantarēṇa tēṣāṁ na mōkṣasiddhirasti ।। iti prāptē brūmaḥ---
tēṣāmatyantavratadhāriṇāṁ muktirēva phalaṁ saṁbhavati । vidyāsaṁpattiśca parabrahmaṇō rudra-
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
rvavidyāṅgatvēna sarvāśramasādhāraṇamiti <quote>‘prāgaṅgāvabaddhāstvi’</quote>tya <ref>(bra॰ 3—3—53)</ref>dhikaraṇē
vyavasthāpitam । dvitīyaṁ dvādaśābdādyavadhisaṁkalpavirajāhōmādipūrvakaṁ yāvatsaṅkalpitā-
vadhi bhasmōddha‍ūlanatripuṇḍradhāraṇaṁ brahmacaryajapadhāraṇādiyuktaṁ vāyusaṁhitādiṣu purāṇēṣu prasi-
ddham । tadadhikr̥tya cintā pravartatē । sarvēṣāmāśramāṇāṁ brahmavidyā tatphalaṁ muktiśca saṁbhava-
tīti varṇitam । ihāśramānantargatatvēna pratīyamānē'tyāśramē sthitānāṁ tadubhayaṁ saṁbhavati
na vēti muktyarthabhasmōddha‍ūlanatripu1ṇḍrādividyāṅgayōgāt putrādiphalaśravaṇācca saṁśayē pūrva-
pakṣaḥ । kimētatpāśupatavrataṁ yāvajjīvikaṁ muktiphalam uta dvādaśābdādyavadhikam । nādyaḥ---
tasyāśramēṣvanantarbhāvāt । taddhi na tāvadbrahmacaryaṁ kaiścitpāramahaṁsyadharmairapi yōgāt । nāpi
sannyāsaḥ । agnīndhanādiyōgāt । nāpi gārhasthyam । dārāgnihōtrādirāhityāt । nāpi
vānaprastham । gārhasthyapūrvakatvābhāvāt agnihōtrādyabhāvācca । āśra2mānantarbhāvē ca nāśra-
madharmā vidyāsahakāriṇassaṁbhavanti । āśramāniyatadharmairjapādibhirvidyōpakārāccādviṣayō
na būddhipūrvaṁ parigrāhya <quote>‘ityatastvitarajjyāyō liṅgāccē’</quote>ti <ref>(bra॰ 3—4—39)</ref> sū3trē darśi-
tam । atō na yāvajjīvikasya muktiphalatvaṁ saṁbhavati । nāpi dvādaśābdādyavadhiyuktasya ।
tasyāprāyaṇānuṣṭhēyavidyāṅgatvāyōgāt tasya putrādyarthaṁ kr̥ṣṇādibhiranuṣṭhitatvasyānuśāsanika-
vāyusaṁhitādiṣu pratipāditatvācca । kiṁcāsya pāśupatavratasya muktiphalatvaṁ sākṣādvā vi-
dyāṅgatvēna vā । nādyaḥ---vidyāsādhyāyā muktēḥ vratamātrēṇāsaṁbhavāt । dvitīyē sakalavi-
dyāṅgatvēna muktiphalatvam uta vidyāviśēṣāṅgatvēna । nādyaḥ---gr̥hasthādīnāṁ vidyāmātrē'na-
dhikāraprasaṅgāt । na dvitīyaḥ । tathābhūtavidyāviśēṣādarśanāditi । ēvaṁ prāptē siddhāntaḥ
---yāvajjīvikasyāsya vidyāṅgatvēna yu4ktaṁ muktiphalatvaṁ maunavaditarēṣāmapi vidyāṅgānāmi-
hōpadēśāt । atra hi <quote>‘sahakāryantaravidhiri’</quote>tya<ref>(bra॰ 3—4—46 sū)</ref>dhikaraṇē vidyāṅgatvēna
nirṇītaṁ prakr̥ṣṭamananākhyaṁ maunamupadiṣṭam । yathā vāyusaṁhitāyām---<quote>‘yaḥ kr̥tvātyantikīṁ
dīkṣāmādēhāntamanākulaḥ । suvrataṁ tatprakurvīta sa tu vai naiṣṭhikaḥ smr̥taḥ ।। sō'tyāśramī ca
vijñēyō mahāpāśupatastathā । sa ēva tapatāṁ śrēṣṭhaḥ sa ēva tu mahāvratī । na tēna sadr̥śaḥ ka-
ścit kr̥takr̥tyō mumukṣuṣvi’</quote>tyupakramya <quote>‘śivārpitātmā satataṁ na tēna sadr̥śaḥ kvaci’</quote>dityu-
ktam । atra <quote>‘hyanākula’</quote> iti vyāpārāntaravaiyagryaṁ niṣidhya <quote>‘śivārpitātmā satata’</quote>miti
prakr̥ṣṭamananākhyaṁ maunamēvōktam । tathā maunavadanyēṣāmapi vidyāṅgānāmupadēśō dr̥śyatē ।
‘payōvratī vā bhikṣāśī bhavēdēkāśanastathā । naktayuktāśanō nityaṁ bhūśayyābhirataḥ śuciḥ ।
<note>(1) <quote>‘tripuṇḍradhāraṇādiyōgāt’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(2) <quote>‘āśramatvābhāvē ca’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(3) <quote>‘sūtrōktarītyā/?/
na yāvajjīvikasya’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note> <note>(4) <quote>‘yuktamuktaṁ phalatvamitarēṣāmapi vidyāṅganāṁ’</quote> iti ga. pāṭhaḥ ।</note>
<pb n="414"/>
syānusandhānarūpā । munidharmavaditarēṣāmapi bhikṣācaryaśamadamādīnāṁ paradharmāṇāṁ
pāśupatākhyē vratē'pyupadēśāt tanniṣṭhānāmapi <quote>‘rudra ēkatvamāhuḥ । rudraṁ śāśvataṁ vai
purāṇāmiṣamūrjaṁ tapasā niyacchata vratamētat pāśupatam......agnirityādinā bhasma
gr̥hītvā vimr̥jyāṅgāni saṁspr̥śēt tasmādvratamētat pāśupataṁ paśupāśavimōkṣāya’</quote>
iti rudradhyānasya pāśavicchēdarūpasya mōkṣaphalasya saṁbandhāvagamācca । atō yāva-
dāyuṣaṁ pāśupatavratadhāriṇāṁ muktirēva phalam ।। yaduktamāśramēṣvanantarbhāva iti
tatrāha---
<!-- APPAYYA !-->
bhasmaśāyī tr̥ṇaśāyī cīrājinaśayō'thavā । brahmacaryaratō nityaṁ vratamētatsamācarēt । kṣa-
mādānadayāsatyāhiṁsāśīlassadā bhavēt । santuṣṭaśca praśāntaśca japadhyānaratastathā ।।’ iti ।।
nanu yāvajjīvikasyāpi pāśupatavratasyābhyudayaphalatvamuttararāmāyaṇē pratipāditam । ta1tra
hi kubēravacanam---<quote>“ahaṁ tu himavatpr̥ṣṭhaṁ gatō dharmamupāsitum । raudraṁ vrataṁ samāsthāya niyatō
niyatēndriyaḥ ।।”</quote> iti ।। <quote>“tatō'hamanyadvistīrṇaṁ gatvā tasya girēstaṭam । pūrṇaṁ varṣaśatānyaṣṭau
samavāpaṁ mahāvratam ।।”</quote> iti ca ।। tadanantarañca kubēraṁ prāpti śivavacanam---<quote>“prītō'smi tava
dharmajña tapasānēna suvrata । mayā caitadvrataṁ cīrṇaṁ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa । tr̥tīyaḥ puruṣō
nāsti yaścarēdvratamīdr̥śam । vrataṁ hi dustaraṁ hyētanmayaivōtpāditaṁ purā । tatsakhitvaṁ mayā
saumya rōcayasva dhanēśvara ।।”</quote> iti ।। atra yatpaśupatēḥ śivasya paritōṣaṇēna tatsakhyaprā-
ptiphalaṁ raudravratācaraṇamupakrāntamityuktam । tatra mahāvrataśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ । saca yāvajjī-
vikasya pāśupatavratasya vācaka iti <quote>‘sa ēva syānmahāvratī’</quote>ti vāyusaṁhitāvacanēnāvagatam ।
satyam । iha mahāvrataśabdō yōgēna katipayakālāvadhāvēva pāśupatavratē nētavyaḥ । <quote>‘pūrṇaṁ varṣa-
śatānyaṣṭā’</quote>vityatraivāvadhēruktatvāt । pāśupatavratasyāṅgabhūtā vidyāpyatharvaśirasyēva śrutētyāha
---<pratika>tanniṣṭhānāmiti</pratika> । <quote>“vālāgramātraṁ hr̥dayasya madhyē viśvaṁ dēvaṁ jātavēdaṁ varēṇyam । tamā-
tmasthaṁ yē'nupaśyanti dhīrāstēṣāṁ śāntiśśāśvatī nētarēṣā’</quote>miti daharapuṇḍarīkāntasthapara-
maśivasākṣātkārānmuktimuktvā tatsākṣātkārasādhanaṁ dhyānamucyatē । <quote>‘tr̥ṣṇāṁ chittvē’</quote>tyā-
dinā tr̥ṣṇāṁ viṣayarāgaṁ nirasya hētujālasya rāgadvēṣamadamātsaryādisaṁsārakāraṇajātasya
tāmēva nirasanīyāṁ tr̥ṣṇāṁ mūlaṁ kāraṇaṁ budhdyā saṁcintya buddhiṁ rudrē sthāpayitvā rudrē ēkatvaṁ
tādātmyamāhuḥ । śivō'hamiti bhāvanāmabhyasanīyāmāhurityarthaḥ । śāśvataṁ nityam । purā-
ṇamanādim । iṣamūrjam । <quote>‘sarvō vai rudra’</quote> iti śrutēḥ prāṇināmannam । tatprayuktabalātmakaṁ
bhōgyānandatadanubhavarūpaṁ vā rudraṁ tapasā satatamālōcanarūpēṇa dhyānēna niyacchata niyataṁ
kuruta । ētatpāśupataṁ nāma vratam । <quote>‘agniriti bhasmē’</quote>tyādinā mahāmantrajātēna bhasma gr̥-
hītvā aṅgāni śirōvadanādīni nimr̥jya saṁspr̥śēt । tasmādbhasmōddha‍ūlanarūpāṅgayōgādēta-
tpāśupatavrataṁ yathōktaṁ dhyānarūpaṁ paśūnāṁ saṁsāriṇāṁ pāśasya malamāyādibandhasya mōkṣāya
<note>(1)<quote>‘tatra hi kubēravacana’</quote>mityārabhya idamadhikaraṇasamāptiparyantō granthabhāgaḥ ga. pustakē nōpalabhyatē । anyamātr̥kāsu
idamadhyāyasamāptiparyantō grantha ēva nāsti । diṣṭyā idamadhyāyasamāptiparyantasya granthasya lābhaḥ mahīśūramahārājasaṁsthāna-
prācīnapustakālayāsāditamātr̥kāmātrāditi mahadbhāgyamativismayanīyamētatsaṅgrāhakasya mamēti sānandamāvēdayē suhr̥daḥ ।</note>
